original: don gyis na mtshan ma thams cad kyang padma'i steng du gyis shig ces bya pa'i don to //
analyzed: don gyis na mtshan ma thams cad kyang padma'i steng du gyis shig ces bya pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that all signs should be made on top of the lotus.

original: de ltar gang zhig bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what is drawn in that way,

original: phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: it is the seals.

original: su zhig gi zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi zhe na /
translated: If it is asked for whom,🔽it is for the four tathāgatas.

original: bde gshegs nyid kyi ste /
analyzed: bde gshegs nyid kyi ste /
translated: The Sugata's own.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: of the Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di dag ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na bde gshegs nyid kyi zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na bde gshegs nyid kyi zhes bya ste /
translated: These are the Sugata's own, thus they are called the Sugata's own.

original: de'i thugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'am //
analyzed: de'i thugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'am //
translated: They are the essence of his mind,

original: yang na de'i sras su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro /🔽de yang // yan lag yan lag las byung zhing //
analyzed: yang na de'i sras su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro / de yang // yan lag yan lag las byung zhing //
translated: or they are his sons.🔽And it is as stated in the Vidyā:🔽You have arisen from the limbs,

original: snying las kyang ni khyod skyes pas /
analyzed: snying las kyang ni khyod skyes pas /
translated: and from the heart,

original: bu yi ming ni bdag nyid de //
analyzed: bu yi ming ni bdag nyid de //
translated: so the name of the son is the self,

original: khyod ni ston brgyar 'tsho bar shog / ces rig las ji skad bshad pa lta bu ste //
analyzed: khyod ni ston brgyar 'tsho bar shog / ces rig las ji skad bshad pa lta bu ste //
translated: may you live a hundred autumns.

original: de bas na bde gshegs nyid ces bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bde gshegs nyid ces bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the Sugata's own.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'du gtso ba'i phyag rgya ji ltar bris ba de bzhin du 'dir yang bya bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'du gtso ba'i phyag rgya ji ltar bris ba de bzhin du 'dir yang bya bar ston pa'o //
translated: Just like that shows that just as the principal consort is drawn in the Akṣobhya maṇḍala, here too it is to be done in the same way.

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis bar yang zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ltos na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis bar yang zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ltos na /
translated: Also between the two mandalas means that in relation to the Akshobhya mandala,

original: rin che 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis par 'gyur bas na dkyil 'khor gnyis pa der ro //
analyzed: rin che 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis par 'gyur bas na dkyil 'khor gnyis pa der ro //
translated: the Ratnasambhava mandala is the second mandala, so it is in that second mandala.

original: phyag rgya de rnams kyi ming ji skad du bya ba yin zhe na /🔽sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya de rnams kyi ming ji skad du bya ba yin zhe na / sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya //
translated: What are the names of those seals?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should draw the consecration of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas ni 'od dpag tu med pa dbang bskur ba'i gnas ni gnas gang yin pa de la ni sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bshad do /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni 'od dpag tu med pa dbang bskur ba'i gnas ni gnas gang yin pa de la ni sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bshad do /
translated: The consecration of the Buddha is explained as the place where Amitabha confers consecration.

original: @46a * // de med na yang de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: @46a * // de med na yang de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If that is not present, then what is it like?

original: gtsug phud dbus su chu skyes che //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gtsug phud dbus su chu skyes che // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In the middle of the topknot, the great lotus.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i thor tshugs bris la /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i thor tshugs bris la /
translated: One should draw Avalokiteshvara's hair in a topknot.

original: de'i dbus su 'od dpag tu med pa'i gdan padma bri'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbus su 'od dpag tu med pa'i gdan padma bri'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in the middle of that, one should draw the lotus seat of Amitabha.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni chu skyes chen po'i ste phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni chu skyes chen po'i ste phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i'o //
translated: The its is of the great lotus, that is, of the second outer maṇḍala.

original: phyogs rnams thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi char du yang ngo //
analyzed: phyogs rnams thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi char du yang ngo //
translated: In all directions means in all four directions.

original: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //🔽zhes bya ba ltag 'og ces smos pas ni de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par ston to //
analyzed: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du // zhes bya ba ltag 'og ces smos pas ni de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par ston to //
translated: In the proper order,

original: go rims ji bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim bzhin pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: go rims ji bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim bzhin pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: In the proper order means in the proper sequence.

original: go rims gang dang gang gis dkyil 'khor gdon par mdzad pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: go rims gang dang gang gis dkyil 'khor gdon par mdzad pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'o //
translated: In whatever order the maṇḍala is to be drawn, in that very order it is to be drawn.

original: padmo'i mtshan ma dang bcas pas na padmo'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: padmo'i mtshan ma dang bcas pas na padmo'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Having the sign of a lotus means having the sign of a lotus.

original: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
translated: The supreme commitments are the commitment seals.

original: mchog ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chur pa nyid du dgod cing bri bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chur pa nyid du dgod cing bri bar bya ba'o //
translated: The supreme ones are to be placed and drawn in the water inside the initiation maṇḍala.

original: 'dir yang rig pa dang po ni bdag po'i gnas kyi yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang rig pa dang po ni bdag po'i gnas kyi yin te /
translated: Here, the first awareness is that of the lord.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be understood in order.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gsum pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gsum pa ste /
translated: The Dharma maṇḍala is the third maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni de'i dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni de'i dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: In the middle of that means in the middle of its central maṇḍala.

original: padmo bzang mo yin pas na padmo mdzes pa padmo mdzes pa'i gdan de la ci zhig bri bar bya zhen na /
analyzed: padmo bzang mo yin pas na padmo mdzes pa padmo mdzes pa'i gdan de la ci zhig bri bar bya zhen na /
translated: Since it is a good lotus, it is a beautiful lotus. What should be drawn on that seat of the beautiful lotus?

original: padma zhes bya ba gsungs te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas su spyan bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba gsungs te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas su spyan bri bar bya'o //
translated: It is said: lotus. In the place of Lokeśvara, the eye should be drawn.

original: 'jam dpal gyi gnas su ral gri //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi gnas su ral gri //
translated: In the place of Mañjuśrī, the sword.

original: rdo rje rgyu'i gnas su phyag rgya bzhi /
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu'i gnas su phyag rgya bzhi /
translated: In the place of Vajrarāja, the four seals.

original: rig pa las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bri bar bya ste padma gcig bris la /
analyzed: rig pa las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bri bar bya ste padma gcig bris la /
translated: They should be drawn as explained in the awareness. One lotus should be drawn.

original: de'i 'dab ma bzhi la padma dang / dur dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyig pa zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'dab ma bzhi la padma dang / dur dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyig pa zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
translated: On its four petals, a lotus, a skull, a wheel, and a mace should be placed.

original: rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su yang sna tshogs pa'i rigs pa las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bzhi 'di bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su yang sna tshogs pa'i rigs pa las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bzhi 'di bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the place of the Vajra King, one should draw the four seals arising from various kinds of reasoning.

original: rdo rje smra ba'i gnas su ni lce'o //🔽padmo'i dbus su padmo bri //
analyzed: rdo rje smra ba'i gnas su ni lce'o // padmo'i dbus su padmo bri //
translated: In the place of the Vajra Speech, one should draw the tongue.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the center of the lotus, one should draw a lotus.

original: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas su padma zis la de'i dbus su 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pas bskor ba'i padma bri'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas su padma zis la de'i dbus su 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pas bskor ba'i padma bri'o //
translated: In the place of the Unfailing Accomplishment, one should draw a lotus flower, and in its center a lotus surrounded by a garland of flames.

original: gang gi dbang phyug gi gnas su lag pa gnyis gar byed par bri'o //
analyzed: gang gi dbang phyug gi gnas su lag pa gnyis gar byed par bri'o //
translated: In the place of the Lord, one should draw two hands dancing.

original: de @46b nas go cha dang mche ba dang khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de @46b nas go cha dang mche ba dang khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should draw the armor, fangs, and fists.

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wa dang gar gyi lag pa gnyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wa dang gar gyi lag pa gnyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should also draw the two hands of Charm and so forth, in the proper order, with the vajra, jewel garland, veena, and dance.

original: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi spos snod dang / me tog gi za ma tog dang / mar me'i stong bu dang ; dri'i snod rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi spos snod dang / me tog gi za ma tog dang / mar me'i stong bu dang ; dri'i snod rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: The incense-holder and so on of the incense and so forth, the flower-box, the lamp-stand, and the perfume-holder should be drawn.

original: sangs rgyas mchod pa zhes gtso bor smos su zin kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod pa zhes gtso bor smos su zin kyang /
translated: Although the worship of the Buddhas is mentioned as the chief [topic],

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang mchod pa byed par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang mchod pa byed par blta bar bya'o //
translated: the Lāsyā and so on should be seen as worshipping the Bodhisattvas here.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa thams cad kyang padma la gnas shing padmas mtshan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri ba bya'o //🔽btsud de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i cho ga 'gro ba 'dul ba las ras dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa thams cad kyang padma la gnas shing padmas mtshan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri ba bya'o // btsud de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i cho ga 'gro ba 'dul ba las ras dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: All of the Vajra-pāśa and so on should be drawn just as they are, standing on lotuses and marked with lotuses.

original: ras rkyang pas gdong g-yogs nas dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ras rkyang pas gdong g-yogs nas dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having entered means that, having covered the face with a single white cloth, as it is said in the Vajradhātu [Tantra] ritual, having entered the maṇḍala, and so on, one should say this.

original: khyod kyi gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni gsang ba spel bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: khyod kyi gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni gsang ba spel bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: Do not tell this secret to anyone means do not divulge the secret.

original: gang gi phyir sngags kyi rgyud rnams gsang ba nyid stobs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngags kyi rgyud rnams gsang ba nyid stobs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the power of the secret of the mantra tantras is strong.

original: khyod sems can dmyal bar ltung nga re zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba spel ba dgag pa mdzad pa ste de las 'das par gyur na ;
analyzed: khyod sems can dmyal bar ltung nga re zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba spel ba dgag pa mdzad pa ste de las 'das par gyur na ;
translated: Do not let it fall to the hells means that the Blessed One prohibits divulging the secret, and if one transgresses that,

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas dmyal bar ltung ba dang / tshe 'di nyid la yang khams mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par mang po myang bar 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas dmyal bar ltung ba dang / tshe 'di nyid la yang khams mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par mang po myang bar 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: it is taught that after death, one will fall to the hells, and in this very life, one will experience many sufferings such as imbalances of the elements and so on.

original: dang por mna'i snying po byin la de'i 'og tu bcug ste /
analyzed: dang por mna'i snying po byin la de'i 'og tu bcug ste /
translated: First, give the essence of the mantra, then have them recite it.

original: khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: Ask, What do you see in your mind's eye?

original: brlab po zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang rjes su mthun par de la dngos grub kyi lung spyin par bya ste /
analyzed: brlab po zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang rjes su mthun par de la dngos grub kyi lung spyin par bya ste /
translated: The phrase he should empower him means that he should give the prophecy of his spiritual power in accordance with his appearance.

original: khyod kyi che ge mo zhes bya ba 'grub par snang gi 'di la khyod kyis mngon par brtson par bya'i //
analyzed: khyod kyi che ge mo zhes bya ba 'grub par snang gi 'di la khyod kyis mngon par brtson par bya'i //
translated: You will attain such and such, he should say, it appears, so you should strive for this,

original: gzhan du ma yin no zhes 'di tsam gyi tshig la bsgo ba ni bslab pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ma yin no zhes 'di tsam gyi tshig la bsgo ba ni bslab pa yin no //
translated: and not for anything else. This much is the instruction.

original: de ltar de'i dngos grub shes par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar de'i dngos grub shes par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having thus made him understand his spiritual power, he should remove the blindfold in the proper way, with the words:

original: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
translated: Now you have seen Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //🔽snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas rnams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so // snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas rnams te /
translated: and all the Tathagatas,

original: rdo rje dbyings las @47a * //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings las @47a * //
translated: and the mandala of Vajra Dharma.🔽From this day forth, you should always strive for the welfare of beings.🔽 The phrase he should generate the intuition in him in accordance with his vessel means that he should generate the yogic states in accordance with his spiritual power,🔽such as the spiritual powers of the intuition of success in the Vajra Realm,

original: don grub pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub pa la sogs ji skad bshad pa rnams so //
analyzed: don grub pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub pa la sogs ji skad bshad pa rnams so //
translated: and the intuition of magical powers, as they are explained.

original: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya //
translated: One should train in the knowledge of the seals.

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should bind the pledge seals.

original: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs las ji skad bshad pa dang / 'og nas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs las ji skad bshad pa dang / 'og nas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In all the maṇḍalas such as the Vajra Element and so forth means that one should train in the knowledge of the seals in the maṇḍalas of the Tathāgata family, the Vajra family, and the Jewel family, as explained above and below, in accordance with the vessels.

original: khyod kyi mig lam du ji ltar snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du dris la /
analyzed: khyod kyi mig lam du ji ltar snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du dris la /
translated: “What appears to your eyes?” and so forth, as before.

original: gang gis ji ltar mthong ba de de lta bu'i dngos grub kyi snod yin no //
analyzed: gang gis ji ltar mthong ba de de lta bu'i dngos grub kyi snod yin no //
translated: Whoever sees whatever, that person is a vessel for that particular spiritual power.

original: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa zhes bya ba la phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa zhes bya ba la phyag rgya ste /
translated: One should train in the knowledge of the seals means that one should bind the pledge seals.

original: phal cher ni phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang chos kyi phyag rgyal la bya'o //
analyzed: phal cher ni phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang chos kyi phyag rgyal la bya'o //
translated: For the most part, the mudra is the great seal, the pledge seal, the action seal, and the doctrine seal.

original: la lar ni mig gi phyag rgya dang / so dang mchu'i phyag rgya rnams kyang gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: la lar ni mig gi phyag rgya dang / so dang mchu'i phyag rgya rnams kyang gzung bar bya ste /
translated: In some cases, the eye mudra and the teeth and lip mudra are also to be taken.

original: de rnams kyi ye shes bslab par bya zhing /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ye shes bslab par bya zhing /
translated: One should train in their knowledge,

original: yang dag par lung spying par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par lung spying par bya'o //
translated: and should give them the right prediction.

original: brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mig lam du snang ba'i mtshan nyid las skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste /
analyzed: brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mig lam du snang ba'i mtshan nyid las skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste /
translated: One should examine them means that one should examine them according to their fortune, from the characteristics that appear to the eye.

original: snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed par bya'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed par bya'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: One should generate knowledge according to the vessel, as it is said.🔽Now,

original: da ni / spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che //
analyzed: da ni / spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che //
translated: Avalokiteśvara, the great being,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te //
translated: and so on is taught.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: Avalokiteśvara is general.

original: sems dpa' che ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' che ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: The great being is the cakravartin.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is he like?

original: sna tshogs gzugs su zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs su zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In various forms means

original: gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
translated: in the meditative absorption that displays all forms.

original: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag nyid do //
translated: The self is oneself.

original: bdag kyang gal te gzhan la phan par 'dod pas de ltar bsgoms mo zhe na /
analyzed: bdag kyang gal te gzhan la phan par 'dod pas de ltar bsgoms mo zhe na /
translated: If one cultivates that in order to benefit others,

original: smras pa ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa ma yin no //
translated: it is said, not so!

original: 'o na ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: rang nyid bsgoms nas phyag rgya chen po yi //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid bsgoms nas phyag rgya chen po yi // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having cultivated oneself, one should cultivate the great seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po de ltar bsgoms pas ci zhig 'thob ce na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de ltar bsgoms pas ci zhig 'thob ce na /
translated: What is attained by cultivating the great seal in that way?

original: mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The supreme attainment is attained.

original: mchog gi dngos grub ni 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub ni 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The supreme attainment has the characteristic of attaining the supramundane and so forth.

original: phyag rgya chen po smos pas ni phyag rgya bzhi char yang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po smos pas ni phyag rgya bzhi char yang yin mod kyi /
translated: Although all four seals are mentioned by the term great seal,

original: phyag rgya @47b chen po gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phyag rgya @47b chen po gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: the great seal is taught as the principal one.

original: rigs 'di ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas nam /
analyzed: rigs 'di ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas nam /
translated: This family is the nature of the thought of awakening, and therefore it is said, this family is the best.

original: phyag rgya chen po de gtso bor gyur pas 'dir gnas par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de gtso bor gyur pas 'dir gnas par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the Great Seal is the principal one, it is necessary to abide in it here.

original: da ni / sangs rgyas dbang gi dam tshig ni //
analyzed: da ni / sangs rgyas dbang gi dam tshig ni //
translated: Now, the pledge of the empowerment of the Buddha

original: zhes bya ba la sogs sangs rgyas dbang gi gnas kyi dngos grub pa ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs sangs rgyas dbang gi gnas kyi dngos grub pa ston te /
translated: teaches the power of the place of the empowerment of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas de bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang bskur gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas dbang gi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang bskur gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas dbang gi'o //
translated: The empowerment of the Buddha is the empowerment of the Lord of the Mandala, Vairochana.

original: dam tshig ces smos pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i rnal 'byor yang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: dam tshig ces smos pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i rnal 'byor yang yin mod kyi /
translated: The pledge is mentioned because it is also the yoga of the four seals.

original: rin po che'i rigs ni dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig dang 'brel bas na gtso bstan pa'i phyir dam tshig ces smos pa yin no //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs ni dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig dang 'brel bas na gtso bstan pa'i phyir dam tshig ces smos pa yin no //
translated: Since the jewel lineage is connected with the pledge of empowerment, the pledge is mentioned in order to teach the principal one.

original: mnyam par gzhag pas zhes bya ba'i 'di ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pas zhes bya ba'i 'di ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: The phrase “by one who is equipoised” teaches the following.

original: mnyam par 'jog pa la gnas pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mnyam par 'jog pa la gnas pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The accomplishment is achieved by one who abides in equipoise.

original: g-yengs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: g-yengs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not achieved by one who is distracted.

original: brtan byas te zhes bya ba ni shin tu bsgoms pa byas pa'o //
analyzed: brtan byas te zhes bya ba ni shin tu bsgoms pa byas pa'o //
translated: Having stabilized means having cultivated well.🔽If one meditates on oneself as

original: bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni //
translated: one's own deity,

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa yang bdag rang nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs su bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa yang bdag rang nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs su bsgoms pas so //
translated: in this way, abiding in meditative concentration, one meditates on oneself as the form of one's own deity.

original: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the supreme power.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This means that one will attain the power characterized by Buddhahood and Bodhisattvahood.🔽Now, the line beginning

original: da ni / padmo padmo sems dpa' cher //
analyzed: da ni / padmo padmo sems dpa' cher //
translated: Padma, Padma, great being,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dngos grub ston te /
translated: teaches the power of Amitabha's abode, the foremost of the Dharma seals.

original: padmo la padmo yod pas padmo'i padmo ste /
analyzed: padmo la padmo yod pas padmo'i padmo ste /
translated: Padma, Padma means lotus, lotus,

original: tshangs pa'i padmo la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gdan gyi padmo ni padmo'i padmo'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i padmo la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gdan gyi padmo ni padmo'i padmo'o //
translated: the lotus of Brahma is the seat of Lokeśvara, the lotus of the lotus.

original: sems dpa' che ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: sems dpa' che ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: Great being is Lokeśvara.

original: bdag rang nyid ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i spyi'i tshig gis bdag ces bya ba ni byed pa po'i tshul la zer la rang gnyid ces bya ba 'dis ni bdag nyid ces bya ba'i tshul du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag rang nyid ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i spyi'i tshig gis bdag ces bya ba ni byed pa po'i tshul la zer la rang gnyid ces bya ba 'dis ni bdag nyid ces bya ba'i tshul du bstan pa yin no //
translated: The phrase one's own self is a common worldly expression. The term self refers to the manner of an agent, while the term own indicates the manner of an object.

original: bsgoms pa ni goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa ni goms par bya ba'o //
translated: Cultivation means to practice.

original: ci ltar rung ba bsgoms pas kyang thob par 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rung ba bsgoms pas kyang thob par 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Is it possible to attain [the supreme state] by cultivating what is improper?

original: smras pa ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not, he says.

original: mnyam par gzhag ces gsungs so //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag ces gsungs so //
translated: He says, in meditative equipoise.

original: de ltar bsgoms pas ci zhig thob ce na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pas ci zhig thob ce na /
translated: What is attained by such cultivation?

original: dam pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: dam pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: He says, the supreme attainment.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa ston la /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa ston la /
translated: The essence explained below primarily teaches the Dharma seal.

original: chos kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba @48a * //
analyzed: chos kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba @48a * //
translated: The phrase the meditative stabilization of Dharma

original: 'dis ni dngos grub ni chos bsgoms pa la rag lus par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni dngos grub ni chos bsgoms pa la rag lus par ston to //
translated: teaches that attainment depends on the cultivation of Dharma.

original: da ni rang byung zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: da ni rang byung zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ston te /
translated: Now, beginning with self-arisen, he teaches the attainment of the action family.

original: rang byung zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya bzhi char du yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: rang byung zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya bzhi char du yod du zin kyang /
translated: Although this “self-arisen” is present in all four seals,

original: rang byung zhes pa 'dis dbus na bzhugs pa'i lha de dang 'brel pa'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: rang byung zhes pa 'dis dbus na bzhugs pa'i lha de dang 'brel pa'i las kyi phyag rgya yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: this “self-arisen” indicates that the karmamudrā is connected with the deity who resides in the center.

original: gdon mi za par grub pa ston pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gdon mi za par grub pa ston pa yang yin la /
translated: It also indicates that the accomplishment is certain.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su yang bzhugs pas na gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su yang bzhugs pas na gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ste /
translated: Since he resides in the form of Lokeśvara, he is called “the certain lord.”

original: gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa yin no /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa yin no /
translated: “The certain lord” is a compound word in which the middle term is elided.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: His nature is his essence.

original: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni rigs dang 'brel pas na las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni rigs dang 'brel pas na las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor bstan pa yin te /
translated: The karmamudrā is taught as the principal one because of its connection with the family.

original: gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug de'i las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug de'i las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The karmamudrā of that certain lord should be accomplished.

original: ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /🔽cho ga bzhin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na / cho ga bzhin zhe na /
translated: How should it be accomplished?🔽According to the rite.

original: cho ga bzhin du'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du'o //
translated: According to the rite.

original: 'dir cho ga gang zhig yin zhe na na ;
analyzed: 'dir cho ga gang zhig yin zhe na na ;
translated: Here, what is the rite?

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa thob nas phra mo bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa thob nas phra mo bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: Having obtained the commitments and so on taught in the Yoga Tantra, one should cultivate the subtle [vajra and lotus].

original: sngon du bsnyen pa zla ba'am /
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa zla ba'am /
translated: One should perform the preliminary service for one month,

original: zla ba bzhi'am /
analyzed: zla ba bzhi'am /
translated: or four months,

original: lo gcig gi bar du rus bzhir byas nas /
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du rus bzhir byas nas /
translated: or one year, dividing it into four parts,

original: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya ba 'di ni cho ga'o //
analyzed: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya ba 'di ni cho ga'o //
translated: and finally meditate throughout the night. This is the rite.

original: de ltar cho ga 'dis bsgrubs na ;
analyzed: de ltar cho ga 'dis bsgrubs na ;
translated: Thus, if one accomplishes by this rite,

original: / dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will attain power.

original: dus ji srid gcig gis she na /
analyzed: dus ji srid gcig gis she na /
translated: For how long a time?

original: myur du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said quickly,

original: gang gi phyir dngos grub dam pa yang lo gcig gis 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos grub dam pa yang lo gcig gis 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even the highest power is attained in one year.

original: ji lta bu'i dngos grub 'thob ce na //
analyzed: ji lta bu'i dngos grub 'thob ce na //
translated: What kind of power is attained?

original: mchog ces bya ba gsungs te dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba gsungs te dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said supreme, meaning highest.

original: de ltar dngos grub mchog bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dngos grub mchog bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the supreme power,🔽now,

original: da ni // kha'i nang du dbyig bcug ste //
analyzed: da ni // kha'i nang du dbyig bcug ste //
translated: placing the jewel in the mouth,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don gyi dngos grub pa ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don gyi dngos grub pa ston te /
translated: and so on, teaches the power of the meaning.

original: dbyig ni pa ne la sogs pa dpe las blugs pa ste /
analyzed: dbyig ni pa ne la sogs pa dpe las blugs pa ste /
translated: The jewel is a pane of glass, etc.

original: de khar bcug nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de khar bcug nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: , which is placed in the mouth and meditated upon.

analyzed: padma bcad na zhes bya ba ni sngon bu las dpog pa ni bcad pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag par zhes bya ba ni cho ga ste bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa yang dag par rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: dam tshig mchog ni de nyid kyis //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni de nyid kyis //

analyzed: btogs pa ni brdabs pa ste zegs par bya'o //

original: rab tu brtan pa ni shin tu phye mar brlab pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtan pa ni shin tu phye mar brlab pa'o //

analyzed: gang gi ming zhes @49b bya ba ni gang la dmigs nas 'di bya ba de'i ming nas smos pa'o //

analyzed: de'i 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: His destruction means his death, that is, his death.

original: ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings pa la //
analyzed: ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings pa la //

original: zhes bya ba ni bcing ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcing ba'o //

original: padmo bzung ba ji bzhin du //
analyzed: padmo bzung ba ji bzhin du //
translated: Just as one holds a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

analyzed: 'dir ni yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gzung gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'am las kyi phyag rgya yin pa la ni 'dir 'bad dgos pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, the dharma mudra is taken as primary. It is not necessary to exert oneself here with the samadhi mudra or the karma mudra.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //🔽gang la khros pas btogs bya bas //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o // gang la khros pas btogs bya bas //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽One should crush with anger whoever is to be seized.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi ming nas smos te khros nas brdab cing zegs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi ming nas smos te khros nas brdab cing zegs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should crush and speak with anger, mentioning their name.

original: de ye srog ni 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ye srog ni 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: Their life will be destroyed.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog dang 'bral ba zhes bya ba'i don te 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog dang 'bral ba zhes bya ba'i don te 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: This means that their life will be taken away, up to the meaning of they will die.

original: 'dir 'chi ba'i dbang du byas pas yin mod kyi brgyal bar byas pa ste nga rgyal can tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir lha chen po dang 'dra bar 'dod na slar yang srog sbyin par bya'o ;
analyzed: 'dir 'chi ba'i dbang du byas pas yin mod kyi brgyal bar byas pa ste nga rgyal can tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir lha chen po dang 'dra bar 'dod na slar yang srog sbyin par bya'o ;
translated: Here, although it is in terms of death, if one wishes to be like the great god in order to be a conqueror, one should again give life, in order to destroy the proud.

original: / dam tshig gi phyag rgyar gtogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i dngos grub rnams bshad zin to //
analyzed: / dam tshig gi phyag rgyar gtogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i dngos grub rnams bshad zin to //
translated: The powers of meditating on oneself as the great seal belonging to the pledge seal have been explained.

original: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the powers of meditating on oneself as the form of the pledge seal, the text says, “Then, the knowledge of the secret seal of the pledge of Dharma is this,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por bsgoms pa'i dngos grub kyi rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por bsgoms pa'i dngos grub kyi rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “ Then” means after the powers of meditating on oneself as the great seal.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi gsang ba'i ye shes bshad ba'o ;
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi gsang ba'i ye shes bshad ba'o ;
translated: The dharma is the secret knowledge of the pledges of the pledge seal of the Dharma clan.

original: / gsang ba zhes bya ba ni gnas gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba ste sbas pa gang yin pa'o //🔽de yang spas pa ni tshig gang /

translated: The secret is the secret because of being the nature of the secret place, and it is the hidden.

original: tshig gzhan pa la don gzhan pa de la 'jig rten na spas pa zhes zer te /
analyzed: tshig gzhan pa la don gzhan pa de la 'jig rten na spas pa zhes zer te /
translated: Moreover, the hidden is the word, and the other meaning is the other word. That is called hidden in the world.

original: gsang ba de nyid kyi ye shes yin pas na chos kyi dam tshig gi bsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //🔽padmo la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: gsang ba de nyid kyi ye shes yin pas na chos kyi dam tshig gi bsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so // padmo la ni bud med bsam //
translated: That secret is the knowledge, and so it is the knowledge of the pledge seal of the Dharma clan.🔽The lotus is imagined as the woman and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padma ni stan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padma ni stan du gyur pa'o //
translated: The lotus is the seat.

original: bud med ni phyag rgya rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: bud med ni phyag rgya rnams kyi'o //
translated: The woman is the seal.

original: bsam zhes bya ba ni sems kyis bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: bsam zhes bya ba ni sems kyis bsgom pa ste /
translated: The imagined is the meditation with the mind.

original: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa yin pas na bud med ces bya ba ni 'dir @50a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa yin pas na bud med ces bya ba ni 'dir @50a * //
translated: Since it is from the perspective of the mandala of seals, the woman here

original: phyag rgya yin par gzung ngo //
analyzed: phyag rgya yin par gzung ngo //
translated: is to be taken as the seal.

original: de'i steng bdag nyid rdo rjer ba sgyur //
analyzed: de'i steng bdag nyid rdo rjer ba sgyur //
translated: On top of that, one should transform oneself into the Vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni stan du gyur pa'i padma de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje padmar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stan du gyur pa'i padma de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje padmar bsam pa'o //
translated: This means that on top of that lotus which is the seat, one should imagine oneself as the Vajra Lotus.

original: padmo par mchog ces bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir padmo pad mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: padmo par mchog ces bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir padmo pad mchog ces bya'o //
translated: The lotus of lotuses is the supreme lotus, which is the abode of the Lord of the World who tames beings. It is called the lotus of lotuses because it is the chief of all.

original: yang na rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi padmas bskor ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i padmo ni mchog ste mchog ste de rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi padmas bskor ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i padmo ni mchog ste mchog ste de rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, the lotus in the center surrounded by the lotuses of one's own mandala is supreme, because it is the chief of those.

original: rtse byed cing ces bya ba ni bsgom pa brtan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtse byed cing ces bya ba ni bsgom pa brtan par byed pa'o //
translated: Playing means stabilizing the meditation.

original: mnyam par gzhag na dngos grub 'thob //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag na dngos grub 'thob //
translated: One attains power through equipoise.

original: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This means that one attains power through the completion of the meditation on the seal.

original: padmo la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: padmo la ni bud med bsam //
translated: One should imagine a woman on the lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral ba dang / thor tshugs kyi phyag rgya la gdan gyi padmo bsams la /🔽de'i steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral ba dang / thor tshugs kyi phyag rgya la gdan gyi padmo bsams la / de'i steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur //
translated: The hair-knot and topknot mudras of Avalokiteśvara are imagined as the seat lotus.🔽 And I transform myself into the Buddha

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the second chapter, the chapter on the benefits of bodhicitta.

original: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med par bdag nyid rnams par bsams pa'o //
analyzed: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med par bdag nyid rnams par bsams pa'o //
translated: One imagines oneself as the Bhagavat Amitābha, dwelling in the middle of the hair-knot and topknot ornaments.🔽 The crown-Buddha

original: rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni //
analyzed: rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni //
translated: The crown ornament is the Buddha.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba ste /
translated: is the stabilization.

original: 'di ni dbu rgyan sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir dbu rgyan sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni dbu rgyan sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir dbu rgyan sangs rgyas so //
translated: It is the crown-Buddha because it is the Buddha in the crown.

original: rnam pa gang gis brtan par bya zhe na bsgoms na zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis brtan par bya zhe na bsgoms na zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: By what aspect is it stabilized? It is said when one meditates on it.

original: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir des ni de 'grub po zhes bya bas bstan to //🔽padmo la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir des ni de 'grub po zhes bya bas bstan to // padmo la ni bud med bsam //
translated: What then? It is taught by one attains it through that.🔽 The woman

original: zhes bya ba ni stan gyi padmo la padmo'i phyag rgya'i padmo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stan gyi padmo la padmo'i phyag rgya'i padmo'o //
translated: is the lotus of the mudra lotus on the seat lotus.

original: de steng padmor bdag bsgyur te //
analyzed: de steng padmor bdag bsgyur te //
translated: And on top of that, I transform myself into a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni stan gyi padma skyes pa'i steng du bdag nyid padmo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stan gyi padma skyes pa'i steng du bdag nyid padmo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsam pa'o //
translated: This means that on top of the lotus seat, one should imagine oneself in the form of the lotus seal.

original: rtse zhing zhes bya ba ni bsgom pas brtan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtse zhing zhes bya ba ni bsgom pas brtan par bya ba'o //
translated: Playing means stabilizing through meditation.

original: padmo pa da mchog ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: padmo pa da mchog ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The supreme lotus is as before.

original: dag pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dag pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the accomplishment of purity.

original: zhes bya ba la dag pa ste bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pas yid la 'dod pa'i don 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽padmo la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dag pa ste bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pas yid la 'dod pa'i don 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // padmo la ni bud med bsam //
translated: This means that by the completion of the meditation, one attains the desired goal.

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: A woman on a lotus is as before.

original: de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te //
analyzed: de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te //
translated: And on top of that, I transform myself into a variety.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khrigs pa'i padmar bdag nyid bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khrigs pa'i padmar bdag nyid bsam pa'o //
translated: This means that one should imagine oneself on a lotus surrounded by a garland of flames.

original: rtse zhing zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtse zhing zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
translated: Playing means stabilizing.

original: sna chogs padma mchog ces bya ba ni @50b dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'i dbus su bris pa'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs padma mchog go //
analyzed: sna chogs padma mchog ces bya ba ni @50b dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'i dbus su bris pa'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs padma mchog go //
translated: The supreme variegated lotus is the mudra drawn in the center of the fourth mandala.

original: sna tshogs dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sna tshogs dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the variegated powers.

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub rnam par sna tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub rnam par sna tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one will attain the various powers.

original: yang na sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid thob pa ste /
translated: Or else, one attains the very form of the variegated,

original: bsgom pa la dbang du gyur pa 'thob pas bdag nyid gang gi gzugs su ston par 'dod pa de'i gzugs su bdag dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa la dbang du gyur pa 'thob pas bdag nyid gang gi gzugs su ston par 'dod pa de'i gzugs su bdag dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: because one attains mastery over meditation. One will be seen by oneself and others in whatever form one wishes to display.

original: de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas padmo rigs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas padmo rigs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Next, after that, the characteristics of the mudras are stated by “Then, the lotus family” and so forth.

original: padmo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par bslab cing bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: padmo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par bslab cing bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should train in and teach the pristine awareness of the great seal of the secret mandala of the lotus family, correctly and without error.

original: de yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin pa de nyid 'dir phyag chen po yin te /
analyzed: de yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin pa de nyid 'dir phyag chen po yin te /
translated: Moreover, the great seal here is just the pledge seal of the great mandala,

original: dkyil 'khor 'di ni de rnams nyid kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di ni de rnams nyid kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this mandala is just those [pledge seals].

original: sor mo'i rtse sbrang padmor bya //
analyzed: sor mo'i rtse sbrang padmor bya //
translated: The tips of the fingers are joined in the lotus.

original: zhes bya ba la lag pa gnyis ka'i thal mo'i sor mo bar ma gsum char gyi rtse gcig la gcig sbrang la cung zad sgur bar byas pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sor mo'i rtse sprad pa'i padmo'i thal mo yin par shes par bya'o
analyzed: zhes bya ba la lag pa gnyis ka'i thal mo'i sor mo bar ma gsum char gyi rtse gcig la gcig sbrang la cung zad sgur bar byas pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sor mo'i rtse sprad pa'i padmo'i thal mo yin par shes par bya'o
translated: The tips of the three middle fingers of both palms are joined together, slightly bent, and this is to be known as the lotus gesture of the tips of the fingers of the Blessed Vairocana.

original: // rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sprad //
analyzed: // rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sprad //
translated: The two index fingers are joined in the vajra wrathful one.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje ste /
translated: This is the vajra, the two vajra fists with the tips of the two thumbs joined.

original: khro bo'i mdzub mo smos pa ni mdzub mo nye bar mtshon po'i don to //
analyzed: khro bo'i mdzub mo smos pa ni mdzub mo nye bar mtshon po'i don to //
translated: The angry forefinger is mentioned, the forefinger is indicated.

original: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor dang po'i byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor dang po'i byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Now, in the abode of the Subduer of the World, the mudra of the mantra for the consecration of the first mandala.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su de dag nyid nor bur bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su de dag nyid nor bur bya'o //
translated: In the abode of Ratnasaṃbhava, those very [fingers] are made into a jewel.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su ni de nyid padmar bya'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su ni de nyid padmar bya'o //
translated: In the abode of Amitābha, those very [fingers] are made into a lotus.

original: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas su de dag nyid rdo rje bsdam pa'i tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas su de dag nyid rdo rje bsdam pa'i tshul du bya'o //
translated: In the abode of Amoghasiddhi, those very [fingers] are made into the manner of a vajra binding.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i sngags dang po la lnga'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i sngags dang po la lnga'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the five mudrās of the first mantra for the consecration of the mandala,

original: da ni dgong par bya ba'i sngags rnams kyi phyag rgya ni slar bzlog ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas nas brtsams nas ston to //
analyzed: da ni dgong par bya ba'i sngags rnams kyi phyag rgya ni slar bzlog ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas nas brtsams nas ston to //
translated: now, the mudrās of the mantras for the evening rite are taught in reverse order, beginning from the abode of Vairocana.

original: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas kyang //
translated: Having bound the vajra bond,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings ba'o //
translated: means having bound the vajra bond.

original: gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng //
translated: The two middle fingers are extended like sprouts,

original: zhes bya ba ni gung mo gnyis gshibs par bya'o @51a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gung mo gnyis gshibs par bya'o @51a * //
translated: means the two middle fingers should be extended.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i //
analyzed: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i //
translated: The two index fingers and ring fingers are bent,

original: zhes bya ba'i lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la zlum bor bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la zlum bor bya ste /
translated: means the two index fingers and ring fingers of both hands are bent and made into a circle.

original: gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba'i ngos gnyis su mchod rten lta bur bya ba 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i phyag rgya yin te rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi'o //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba'i ngos gnyis su mchod rten lta bur bya ba 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i phyag rgya yin te rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi'o //
translated: On the two sides of the two extended middle fingers, it is made like a stupa. This is the mudra of Shakyamuni, which is for the abode of Vairochana.

original: chos kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag / ces bya ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nyid chos kyi rdo rje ma ste /
analyzed: chos kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag / ces bya ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nyid chos kyi rdo rje ma ste /
translated: The Dharma Vajra is placed at the heart, means the very Dharma Vajra Woman is the Heroine Vajra.

original: snying ga'i gnas su bcings na sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying ga'i gnas su bcings na sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: If bound at the heart abode, it becomes the mudra of the abode of the Heroine Vajra.

original: de nyid kha thur du bstan la dpral ba'i gnas su bzhag na rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya yin te bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kha thur du bstan la dpral ba'i gnas su bzhag na rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya yin te bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If one points downward with that [mudra] and places it on the forehead, it is the mudra of Ratnaratna, called “having changed, place it on the forehead.”

original: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis thur du bkug pa mthe bo gnyis dang rtse sprad par bzhag na ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis thur du bkug pa mthe bo gnyis dang rtse sprad par bzhag na ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one places [the mudra] with the two index fingers bent downward and the tips of the two thumbs joined, it becomes the mudra of Samayavajra.

original: de nyid bkan te spyi bor bzhag na ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i ste bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid bkan te spyi bor bzhag na ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i ste bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: If one raises that [mudra] and places it on the crown of one’s head, it is the mudra of Dharmadhatviśvarī, called “having changed, place it on the crown of one’s head.”

original: phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gnas kyi yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gnas kyi yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that these four mudras are for the places of Sattvavajri and so forth.

original: 'di dag nyid ni bdag po bzhir 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di dag nyid ni bdag po bzhir 'gyur te /
translated: These very [mudras] become the four lords.

original: de bas na de rnams kyi dgod pa'i sngags rnams kyi phyag rgya logs shig tu ma bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na de rnams kyi dgod pa'i sngags rnams kyi phyag rgya logs shig tu ma bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the mudras of their mantras of placement are not explained separately.

original: de nas gzhan yang /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang /
translated: Next,

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la //
translated: having bound the Vajradhātvīśvarī [mudrā],

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gi phyag rgya ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gi phyag rgya ston te /
translated: Thus, the sixteen great beings are taught by the seals.

original: mchod rten padmo'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: mchod rten padmo'i tshul du ni //
translated: The stupa is in the manner of a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la gung mo gnyis padma kha phyi ba lta bur byas na mchod rten padma'i tshul du 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la gung mo gnyis padma kha phyi ba lta bur byas na mchod rten padma'i tshul du 'gyur te /
translated: The Vajradhātvīśvarī is bound, and the two middle fingers are like an open lotus.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of the abode of Vajrasattva.🔽From that, the vajra of the thumbs,

original: de las mthe bo rdo rje dang // zhes bya ba la de las zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya padma lta bu'o //
analyzed: de las mthe bo rdo rje dang // zhes bya ba la de las zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya padma lta bu'o //
translated: From that means from the lotus-like seal of Vajradhātvīśvarī, which was just explained.

original: mthe bo rdo rje dang zhes bya ba ni mthe bo dang bcas par bsgreng la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bo rdo rje dang zhes bya ba ni mthe bo dang bcas par bsgreng la gzhag pa'o //
translated: The vajra of the thumbs means that the thumbs are raised and placed.

original: mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis lcags kyu dang ral grir bya ste /🔽g-yas pas ni lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis lcags kyu dang ral grir bya ste / g-yas pas ni lcags kyu'o //
translated: The two fingers are made into a hook and a sword.🔽The right one is the hook.

original: g-yon pas ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas ni ral gri'o //
translated: The left one is the sword.

original: gung mo ni snga ma bzhin du padmor bya ba ste /
analyzed: gung mo ni snga ma bzhin du padmor bya ba ste /
translated: The middle fingers are made into a lotus as before.

original: 'di ni rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of the Vajra King abode.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: “From that” means from the seal of the Vajra King.

original: mthe bo bsnol nas kyang zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa'o //🔽mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la //
analyzed: mthe bo bsnol nas kyang zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa'o // mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la //
translated: “The thumbs crossed” means the two thumbs are placed as before.

original: zhes bya ba ni @51b mdzub mo g-yas pas mdzub mo g-yon pa bzung la gzhu rgyud 'dzin pa'i tshul du blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni @51b mdzub mo g-yas pas mdzub mo g-yon pa bzung la gzhu rgyud 'dzin pa'i tshul du blang bar bya'o //
translated: “The index fingers firmly holding the index fingers” means the right index finger holds the left index finger, and they are held like the string of a bow.

original: drangs nas zhes bya ba ni g-yon logs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: drangs nas zhes bya ba ni g-yon logs su bskor ba'o //
translated: “Drawing” means circling to the left.

original: rab dga' yin par bshad ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: rab dga' yin par bshad ces bya ba ni //
translated: “Is explained as the highest joy” means

original: rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the seal of Vajra Passion.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: legs so zhes pa 'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: legs so zhes pa 'ang de bzhin te //
translated: “Excellent” is also like that.

original: zhes pa ni phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol gdab pa gnyis byas na padma legs pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol gdab pa gnyis byas na padma legs pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: This means that if one snaps the fingers twice with the two thumbs and index fingers of this very seal, it becomes the seal of Excellent Lotus.

original: mthe bo gnyis bsnyams te /
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis bsnyams te /
translated: The two thumbs are even.

original: bcug nas kyang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bdams par mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'o //
analyzed: bcug nas kyang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bdams par mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'o //
translated: Having inserted means that one inserts the two thumbs into the vajra.

original: mdzub gnyis rtse bku rtse mo ni //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis rtse bku rtse mo ni //
translated: The tips of the two index fingers are bent.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub gnyis gshibs te bkug la mig gi tshul du byas nas de mig gsum pa'i gnas su bzhag na khro gnyer can gyir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub gnyis gshibs te bkug la mig gi tshul du byas nas de mig gsum pa'i gnas su bzhag na khro gnyer can gyir 'gyur ro //
translated: The two index fingers are placed side by side, bent, and made into the shape of eyes. If one places them in the location of the third eye, it becomes the mudra of Krodha-Yamari.

original: gung mo gnyis kyang padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya'o //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis kyang padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya'o //
translated: The two middle fingers should be made like lotus petals.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: That itself is the mudra of Krodha-Yamari.

original: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas na nyi ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas na nyi ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro ;
translated: If one makes it into the shape of a sun mandala at the heart, it becomes the mudra of the sun.

original: / de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing //
analyzed: / de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing //
translated: From that itself, one should raise the banner.

original: zhes bya ba ni padmo'i khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya de las dpung pa gyen du brkyang na rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padmo'i khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya de las dpung pa gyen du brkyang na rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that lotus Krodha-Yamari mudra, if one raises the arm, it becomes the mudra of the banner.

original: ltag par rab tu brkyang bar bya //
analyzed: ltag par rab tu brkyang bar bya //
translated: One should extend it to the nape of the neck.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa mi dgrol bar sor mo thams cad brkyang la ltag par bzhag na mgo bcu gcig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa mi dgrol bar sor mo thams cad brkyang la ltag par bzhag na mgo bcu gcig par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, with the vajra-bond not released, all the fingers extended and placed on the back of the head, it becomes the eleven-headed.

original: rdo rje bzhad mo'i gnas kyi rang gi mgo dgod pa dang bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad mo'i gnas kyi rang gi mgo dgod pa dang bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The place of the vajra-smile is one’s own head, and with the smile it becomes the eleven-headed.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: Having made the vajra-bond,🔽the two tips of the index fingers are bent like a lotus.

original: mdzub gnyis rtsi mo padmor dgug / ces bya ba la rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis pa shibs la tshigs dang po bkug nas padmo sgrol ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis rtsi mo padmor dgug / ces bya ba la rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis pa shibs la tshigs dang po bkug nas padmo sgrol ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the two tips of the index fingers of the vajra-bond are bent at the first joint, and it becomes the mudra of the lotus-liberator.

original: de bzhin padmo'i ral gri ste //
analyzed: de bzhin padmo'i ral gri ste //
translated: Likewise, the lotus sword.

original: zhes bya ba ni padmo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padmo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Thus, the mudra of the lotus-liberator.

original: mdzub mo padmor byas pa sbyar //
analyzed: mdzub mo padmor byas pa sbyar //
translated: The lotus index fingers are joined.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo padmo 'dra bar byas pa gshibs pa nyi tshe'i ral gri'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo padmo 'dra bar byas pa gshibs pa nyi tshe'i ral gri'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro /
translated: Thus, the two index fingers made like a lotus and joined become the mudra of the small sword.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: Having made the vajra-bond,

original: zhes bya ba de bcings la mthe bo g-yon pa nang du bcug na dung gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de bcings la mthe bo g-yon pa nang du bcug na dung gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one makes the left thumb enter inside, this is the conch mudra.

original: mthe bo mtho bar bsgreng zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i mthe bo bsgreng nas bzhag na dbyig pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //🔽sor mo kun brkyang bad mthe'u chung //
analyzed: mthe bo mtho bar bsgreng zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i mthe bo bsgreng nas bzhag na dbyig pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro // sor mo kun brkyang bad mthe'u chung //
translated: The right thumb is extended means that if one places the right thumb in an extended position, this is the vajra mudra.🔽The little finger is extended.

original: zhes bya ba ni sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje bsdams pa ma bkrol bar brkyang ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag @52a * //🔽rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje bsdams pa ma bkrol bar brkyang ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag @52a * // rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the fingers are extended means that if one extends the remaining fingers without releasing the vajra fist, this is the wheel mudra.

original: mthe'u chung ni padmo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthe'u chung ni padmo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: The little finger is the lotus mudra.

original: phyag rgya 'di bzhi char yang rdo rje 'khor lo gcig bu'i yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di bzhi char yang rdo rje 'khor lo gcig bu'i yin no //
translated: All four of these mudras are of the single vajra wheel.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that means from the vajra wheel mudra.

original: thams cad bkug nas kyang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul du bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad bkug nas kyang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul du bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having summoned all, means placed in the manner of the vajra fist.

original: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
analyzed: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
translated: The little finger is like a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur bya ba'o //
translated: This is the two little fingers like lotus petals.

original: mdzub mos nor bu bgrang bar bya //
analyzed: mdzub mos nor bu bgrang bar bya //
translated: The index fingers count the jewel.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo'i rtse mos sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo'i rtse mos sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'o //
translated: This is the tip of the index fingers counting the mantra jewel.

original: mdzub mos ji ltar bgrang zhe na /
analyzed: mdzub mos ji ltar bgrang zhe na /
translated: How do the index fingers count?

original: mthe bo g-yas dang sbyor ba yi //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽'di skad ston te rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma'i tshul du bzhag la g-yon pa'i mthe bo bskyed nas g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'i tshul du bstan par bya ste 'di ni rdo rje smra ba'i
analyzed: mthe bo g-yas dang sbyor ba yi // zhes bya ba gsungs so // 'di skad ston te rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma'i tshul du bzhag la g-yon pa'i mthe bo bskyed nas g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'i tshul du bstan par bya ste 'di ni rdo rje smra ba'i
translated: The right thumb is joined.

original: gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is what is taught. The two little fingers of the vajra-binding are placed like lotus petals, and the left thumb is extended. The right thumb and index finger are shown in the manner of counting the mantra jewel. This is the mudrā of the abode of Vajrabhāṣa.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: Having made the vajra-binding,

original: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
analyzed: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
translated: the two little fingers are like a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: This is the same as before.

original: mdzub mo bsnyams pa padma'i spyan //
analyzed: mdzub mo bsnyams pa padma'i spyan //
translated: The two index fingers are like lotus eyes.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis sbyar la spyan gyi tshul du cung zad bkug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis sbyar la spyan gyi tshul du cung zad bkug pa'o //
translated: The eye is formed by joining the two index fingers and slightly bending them.

original: rab tu gar byed ces bya ba ni g-yas dang g-yon nas sgeg pa dang bcas par dbab pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gar byed ces bya ba ni g-yas dang g-yon nas sgeg pa dang bcas par dbab pa'o //
translated: The dance is the descent of the nectar with a flirtatious movement to the right and left.

original: bzlog par bya zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa ste kha thur du bstan nas spyan gsum pa'i gnas su gtad pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi spyan gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bzlog par bya zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa ste kha thur du bstan nas spyan gsum pa'i gnas su gtad pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi spyan gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The reverse is the reverse, with the face turned downward and the three eyes directed to the place of the three eyes of the Lord of the Dance of the Lotus. This is the seal of the three eyes of the Lord of the Dance of the Lotus.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The vajra-binding and so forth are as before.

original: mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo brkyang pa'i rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo bkug pas btsir ba'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo brkyang pa'i rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo bkug pas btsir ba'o //
translated: The two index fingers bent are the two index fingers bent and the tips of the two thumbs pressed by the bent index fingers.

original: go char bya ba ni go cha'i phyag phyag rgyur byas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: go char bya ba ni go cha'i phyag phyag rgyur byas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The armor is the seal made by the armor hand.

original: de las zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa ste mthe bo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du ngos gnyis ka nas brkyang na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa ste mthe bo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du ngos gnyis ka nas brkyang na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that is the previously explained vajra fist. If one extends the two thumbs in the manner of fangs from both sides, it becomes the mudra of Vajrayaksa.

original: mthe bo gnyis nang gzhug par bya //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis nang gzhug par bya //
translated: One should insert the two thumbs.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug na rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug na rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: That very mudra of Vajrayaksa, if one inserts the two thumbs inside, it becomes the mudra of Vajramusala.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, one should explain

original: zhes bya ba ni rab tu phye ste bshad pas na rab tu bshad bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rab tu phye ste bshad pas na rab tu bshad bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is explained in detail, it is called to be explained.

original: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The supreme commitment is the commitment mudra.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni khyad par du @52b 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni khyad par du @52b 'phags pa'o //
translated: The unsurpassed is the especially exalted.

original: rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'o //
translated: Having clenched the vajra inside,

original: mdzub gnyis padmo 'dra byas la //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis padmo 'dra byas la //
translated: one should make the two index fingers like a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur byas pa'o //
translated: This is the two index fingers like lotus petals.

original: mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni //
analyzed: mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni //
translated: The thumbs crossed with each other

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis skyil mo krung gi tshul du bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis skyil mo krung gi tshul du bzhag pa'o //
translated: This is the two thumbs placed like a crossed vajra.

original: gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad //
analyzed: gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad //
translated: The secret is explained as the various lords.

original: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs can du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs can du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
