translated: This means that the seal of the various forms of Lokeśvara is the seal of the secret mandala.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje bsdams pa las //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje bsdams pa las //
translated: Similarly, from the vajra-bond

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las mthe'u chung gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar ba padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las mthe'u chung gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar ba padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa'o //
translated: This is the two little fingers and two middle fingers joined like lotus petals from the inner binding of the vajra-bond.

original: mthe ba ngos rdo rjer sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: mthe ba ngos rdo rjer sbyar ba ni //
translated: The thumbs joined in the vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ste bzhag na gtsug phud kyi dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te snga ma ni gtsug phud la mthe bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ste bzhag na gtsug phud kyi dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te snga ma ni gtsug phud la mthe bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: This is the center of the crest, the Tathāgata, with the two thumbs erect. The previous one is the crest, and the thumbs are the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Likewise,” etc.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa de nyid las mthe bo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa de nyid las mthe bo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o //
translated: From the vajra-bond bound inward, the two thumbs should be bound in the manner of lotus petals.

original: kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang //
analyzed: kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang //
translated: Having made it emerge from the mouth,

original: zhes bya ba ni kha'i phyogs nas gyen du drang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha'i phyogs nas gyen du drang ba'o //
translated: it is drawn upward from the region of the mouth.

original: de nas ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: Then what should one do?

original: pad du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: pad du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: One should rest in the samādhi of the lotus.

original: pang par skyil mo krung bcas pa'i sked du ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis gzhag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pang par skyil mo krung bcas pa'i sked du ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis gzhag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should rest in the manner of samādhi at the waist, with the legs crossed in the lap.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa nyid do //
translated: “Likewise,” etc. is the vajra-bond bound inward.

original: sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni //
analyzed: sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni //
translated: The surfaces of all the fingers

original: mnyam par dam du bsnyams nas kyang //
analyzed: mnyam par dam du bsnyams nas kyang //
translated: And the fingers are all tightly clenched.

original: zhes bya ba ni sor mo thams cad kyi lto rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du gcig la gcig 'byar bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sor mo thams cad kyi lto rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du gcig la gcig 'byar bar bya ba'o //
translated: This means that the palms of all the fingers are tightly clenched in a vajra fist, with one finger adhering to another.

original: mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bsnyams pa'o //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bsnyams pa'o //
translated: The two index fingers are joined like a vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis sbyar nas rdo rjer bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis sbyar nas rdo rjer bya ba ste /
translated: This means that the two index fingers are joined like a vajra.

original: 'di dag ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o /
translated: These are the mudras of the abode of the unfailing accomplishment.

original: phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag po bzhi'i gnas su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag po bzhi'i gnas su shes par bya'o //
translated: These four mudras should be known as the abodes of the four lords.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same as before.

original: mdzub gnyis padmo 'dra byas la //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis padmo 'dra byas la //
translated: The two index fingers are made like a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar sbyar ba'o //
translated: This means that the two index fingers are joined like lotus petals.

original: mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni //
translated: The two thumbs are also crossed.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo skyil mo krung gi tshul du gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo skyil mo krung gi tshul du gzhag pa'o //
translated: This means that the two thumbs are placed in the manner of a crossed vajra.

original: gung mo gnyis ni rtse sprad @53a * //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni rtse sprad @53a * //
translated: The two middle fingers are joined at the tips.

original: dgug / ces bya ba ni gung mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: dgug / ces bya ba ni gung mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma lta bur sbyar ba ni /
translated: The two middle fingers are joined like the petals of a lotus.

original: gung mo gnyis ni rtsi sprad dgug / ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni rtsi sprad dgug / ces bya ba ste /
translated: The two middle fingers are joined together,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: which should be known as the mudra of the abode of Vajrasattva.

original: de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du byas pa'o//
analyzed: de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du byas pa'o//
translated: The vajra-binding is the same as before.

original: mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la //
analyzed: mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la //
translated: The two thumbs are fully joined in the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni mthe bo gnyis ka bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni mthe bo gnyis ka bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: This is with the two thumbs erect.

original: mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya //
analyzed: mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya //
translated: The index fingers are made into a sword and a hook.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pas ral gri g-yon gyi lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pas ral gri g-yon gyi lcags kyu'o //
translated: The right is a sword, the left a hook.

original: mthe'u chung padmo 'drar byas te //
analyzed: mthe'u chung padmo 'drar byas te //
translated: The little fingers are made like a lotus.🔽This is in the abode of Vajraraja.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya ba ste /
translated: The two middle fingers are joined like the petals of a lotus.

original: 'di ni rdo rje rgyal bo'i gnas su'o //🔽de bzhin du ni bsgyur gnas kyang //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje rgyal bo'i gnas su'o //🔽de bzhin du ni bsgyur gnas kyang //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is in the abode of Vajraraja.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya de nyid g-yon logs su bsgyur bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya de nyid g-yon logs su bsgyur bar bya ba'o //
translated: That same mudra of the adamantine binding is turned to the left.

original: mdzub mo g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sog pa la mdzub mo dang / mthe bo bzung ba ni mdzub mo g-yas ba bsgreng bas g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo dam du bzung la drang ba 'di ni rdo rje chags pa gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sog pa la mdzub mo dang / mthe bo bzung ba ni mdzub mo g-yas ba bsgreng bas g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo dam du bzung la drang ba 'di ni rdo rje chags pa gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: As for the left forefinger, etc., holding the forefinger and the thumb together, the right forefinger is extended, and the left thumb and forefinger are firmly held and extended. This is the mudra of the abode of the adamantine passion.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: That same means the mudra of the adamantine passion.

original: mnyam byas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i sbyor ba btang ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam byas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i sbyor ba btang ba'o //
translated: Having made means having released the union of the adamantine passion.

original: mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo mnan pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo mnan pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The two forefingers are bent and press on the thumbs.

original: mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis se gol gtogs na legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te padmo dgyes pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis se gol gtogs na legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te padmo dgyes pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two forefingers and thumbs are snapped together, and excellent! is given. This is the mudra of the lotus delight.

original: de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las //
analyzed: de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las //
translated: Likewise, from the adamantine binding,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'o //
translated: the forefingers are extended and touch the tips of the thumbs.🔽 The two forefingers are extended and touch the tips of the thumbs. This is the mudra of the adamantine hook.

original: sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The fingers are all joined together.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo gcig tu sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo gcig tu sbyar ba'o //
translated: This means that the tips of all the fingers are joined together in the vajra-binding.

original: mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Pressing down with the two thumbs,

original: mthe bo gnyis kyi ltos sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo ngos gnyi gar mnan pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis kyi ltos sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo ngos gnyi gar mnan pa'o //
translated: this means that the tips of the remaining fingers are pressed down on both sides with the two thumbs.

original: mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o //
translated: The two index fingers are joined together.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis gshibs la dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis gshibs la dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This means that the two index fingers are placed together at the place of consecration, and this is the mudra of the place of the vajra jewel.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The same means the mudra of the vajra jewel.

original: snying gar g-yas nas bskor na rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying gar g-yas nas bskor na rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one turns it to the right at the heart, it becomes the mudra of the vajra sun.

original: de nyid las spyi bor lag ngar brkyang na rdo rje dpal gyi gnas kyi padmo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid las spyi bor lag ngar brkyang na rdo rje dpal gyi gnas kyi padmo'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one extends the forearm to the crown from that same mudra, it becomes the mudra of the lotus victory banner of the place of vajra glory.

original: @53b de nyid bzlog ste /
analyzed: @53b de nyid bzlog ste /
translated: That same mudra is reversed

original: 'gram pa g-yas logs su dgod pa'i tshul du bsgyur te bzhag na padmo cher dgod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gram pa g-yas logs su dgod pa'i tshul du bsgyur te bzhag na padmo cher dgod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one places the right hand on the right cheek, it becomes the mudra of the Great Laughter.

original: rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la //
translated: Having made the vajra fist,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gung mo gnyis rtsi sbyar la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gung mo gnyis rtsi sbyar la /
translated: one should join the two middle fingers,

original: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar ba na rdo rje chos kyi gnas kyi sgrol pa'i autpala'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar ba na rdo rje chos kyi gnas kyi sgrol pa'i autpala'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: and join the two thumbs and little fingers. This is the mudra of the abode of Vajradharma, the Utpalada of Tara.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcing ba bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcing ba bya'o //
translated: As before means that one should bind the vajra fist inwardly.

original: mdzub gung padmo ral grir bya //
analyzed: mdzub gung padmo ral grir bya //
translated: One should make the lotus and sword with the index and middle fingers.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis bkug la padmor bya gung mo gnyis ral grir bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rnon pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis bkug la padmor bya gung mo gnyis ral grir bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rnon pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Having bent the two index fingers, one should make the lotus, and make the middle fingers into a sword. This is the mudra of the abode of Vajratīkṣṇa.

original: de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya //
analyzed: de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya //
translated: As before, one should make the wheel inwardly.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la 'khor lo lta bur cung zad brkyang nas bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la 'khor lo lta bur cung zad brkyang nas bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the gesture of the vajra wheel: bind the vajra bond inside, and place it a little extended like a wheel.

original: zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no //
translated: Reciting, give the same way.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang / mdzub mo rtse mo phyir phyung la sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'i tshul du ston pa ni rdo rje smra ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang / mdzub mo rtse mo phyir phyung la sngags kyi nor bu bgrang ba'i tshul du ston pa ni rdo rje smra ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the gesture of the abode of the vajra speaker: from the vajra bond bound inside, extend the right thumb and forefinger, and show the manner of counting the mantra rosary.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa ste /🔽de bkrol la mtheb mdzub sprad pa gnyis su bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa ste / de bkrol la mtheb mdzub sprad pa gnyis su bya'o //
translated: The same way means the vajra bond bound inside.🔽Unbinding it, make two forefingers and thumbs joined.

original: de nas mthe bo gnyis la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rang gi mthe mo'i rtsir kha thur du bstan te gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas mthe bo gnyis la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rang gi mthe mo'i rtsir kha thur du bstan te gzhag pa'o //
translated: Then, bend the two forefingers on the two thumbs, and place them with the tips facing down on the tips of one’s thumbs.

original: de nas gung mo gnyis bkug la rtse mo thur du bstan nas mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs te gzhag go //🔽de ltar rang gi lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams bzhag la lag pa gnyi ga ngos g-yas g-yon gyi mig gnyis dang mnyam par gzhag na /
analyzed: de nas gung mo gnyis bkug la rtse mo thur du bstan nas mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs te gzhag go // de ltar rang gi lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams bzhag la lag pa gnyi ga ngos g-yas g-yon gyi mig gnyis dang mnyam par gzhag na /
translated: Then, having bent the two index fingers, with the tips pointing downward, one should raise the two little fingers and place them.🔽Thus, having placed the fingers of the two hands, one should place the two hands at the two eyes on the right and left sides.

original: de lta bu ni mthe ba mdzub pa gnyis su byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu ni mthe ba mdzub pa gnyis su byas pa yin te /
translated: Thus, having made the two index fingers,

original: 'di ni rdo rje las kyi gnas khyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje las kyi gnas khyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: this is the mudra of the place of Vajrakarma, the Dog.

original: de nas snying gar sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: de nas snying gar sbyar ba ni //
translated: Then, the one at the heart is joined.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yang snying ga'i gnas su bcings na gsang ba bsrung ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yang snying ga'i gnas su bcings na gsang ba bsrung ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: That is to say, having bound the vajra fist, having joined the two thumbs, if one binds the place of the heart, it becomes the mudra of guarding the secret.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: Thus is as previously explained.

original: mthe'u chung padma 'drar byas la//
analyzed: mthe'u chung padma 'drar byas la//
translated: Having made the two little fingers like a lotus,

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽mthe'u chung gnyis padmo'i 'dab ma'i tshul du sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / mthe'u chung gnyis padmo'i 'dab ma'i tshul du sbyar ba'o //
translated: that is to say,🔽the two little fingers are joined in the manner of lotus petals.

original: mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang //
translated: Having bent the two index fingers,

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis phyir phyung la mche ba lta bur gzhag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis phyir phyung la mche ba lta bur gzhag go //
translated: The line the two fingers extended out means that the two fingers are extended out and placed like fangs.

original: mthe ba gnyis phyir bskyed ces bya ni mthe bo gnyis brkyang la kha'i gnas su gzhag nam che ba @54a * //
analyzed: mthe ba gnyis phyir bskyed ces bya ni mthe bo gnyis brkyang la kha'i gnas su gzhag nam che ba @54a * //
translated: The line the two thumbs extended out means that the two thumbs are extended out and placed in the place of the mouth.

original: can te rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: can te rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the mudra of Vajrayaksa.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The line from that means from the mudra of Vajrayaksa.

original: khu tshur tshul gyis ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur dang 'dra ba'o //🔽mthe ba gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yis //
analyzed: khu tshur tshul gyis ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur dang 'dra ba'o // mthe ba gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yis //
translated: The line in the manner of a fist means like a vajra fist.🔽The line the two thumbs pressed together means that the tips of the two thumbs press together the tips of the two bent fingers.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis kyis mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsir na padmo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khu tshur chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis kyis mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsir na padmo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khu tshur chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the great fist of the secret mandala of the lotus family.

original: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The line the supreme pledge means the pledge mudra.

original: rab brtags so zhe sa bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab brtags so zhe sa bya ba ni /
translated: The line imagined means

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas su bcing ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas su bcing ba'o //
translated: bound in the place of the vajra fist.

original: padmo l'a sye la sogs pa //
analyzed: padmo l'a sye la sogs pa //
translated: Padmollasya, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de 'dra ba ni bcing bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: de 'dra ba ni bcing bar bya // zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: One should bind in that way.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji ltar bar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji ltar bar ro //
translated: As in the great mandala of the vajra realm.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Then, etc. is easy to understand.

original: las kyi phyag rgya mdor byas pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya mdor byas pa'o //
translated: The action seal is summarized.

original: gsang ba'i khu tshur gnyis byas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i khu tshur gnyis byas pa'o //
translated: The secret fists are made.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi khu tshur gang yin pa de gnyis su byas la rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi khu tshur gang yin pa de gnyis su byas la rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: that one should make the two fists that are the places of the just-explained vajra fists and apply them with the characteristics taught in the Vajra Realm [Tantra].

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya chen bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las padmo rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya chen bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las padmo rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the secret mandala of the lotus family from the great explanation of the Compendium of Principles Kosala Ornament.

original: // / da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
analyzed: // / da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
translated: Now, from “Then the Blessed One” and so forth, the Dharma mandala is taught.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor snga ma la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor snga ma la ltos pa'o //
translated: Again means in relation to the previous maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi rtogs pa bzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi rtogs pa bzung ste /
translated: The pledge of the Dharma of all Ones Gone Thus is the realization of the lotus family.

original: ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya bas ni padmo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gzung ngo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya bas ni padmo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gzung ngo //
translated: The pledge of wisdom is the Dharma maṇḍala of the lotus family.

original: de bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byur ba byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byur ba byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to bless the heap from that special thought,

original: 'di nyid ni padma 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni padma 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: this is the very lotus itself. This is the samādhi that is the samādhi of the very lotus itself.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the very lotus itself.

original: rang gi rig pa dam pa gsungs pa ni 'di la sogs pa sngags lnga ni gtso bo lnga'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa dam pa gsungs pa ni 'di la sogs pa sngags lnga ni gtso bo lnga'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The statement of the sublime awareness mantra is that the five awareness mantras beginning with this should be known as the awareness mantras for blessing the maṇḍala of the five principals.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then, etc. Then means immediately after.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par ni rnal 'byor pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par ni rnal 'byor pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te //
translated: Without entering the Dharma mandala, the yogi will not be successful.

original: de bas na rab tu bshad bya ba gsungs @54b te ;
analyzed: de bas na rab tu bshad bya ba gsungs @54b te ;
translated: Therefore, it is said, I will explain.

original: rab tu zhes bya ba ni yang dag par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu zhes bya ba ni yang dag par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Explain means the meaning of “perfectly.”

original: bshad bya ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bshad bya ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Explain means “having analyzed, I will explain.”

original: ci zhig bshad ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig bshad ce na /
translated: What is to be explained?

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The wisdom mandala is stated.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dam pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: dam pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be supreme.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni ;🔽/ zhes ya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni ; / zhes ya ba ste /
translated: It is like the vajra realm.

original: rdo rje dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: It is like the vajra realm.

original: ming 'di skad ces bya zhe na /🔽chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod de //
analyzed: ming 'di skad ces bya zhe na / chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod de //
translated: What is its name?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called the Dharma wisdom.

original: thig ji ltar gdab par bya zhe na /
analyzed: thig ji ltar gdab par bya zhe na /
translated: How is the line to be drawn?

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great maṇḍala,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
translated: all the maṇḍalas are drawn with thread.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par gzung ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par gzung ngo //
translated: Here, the so-called great maṇḍala is taken to be the root maṇḍala of the Vinaya of Beings.

original: de ji lta bur bri zhe na de'i dbus su bri ba ni /
analyzed: de ji lta bur bri zhe na de'i dbus su bri ba ni /
translated: How is it drawn? In the middle of that, it is said:

original: ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The vajra of wisdom, the tathāgata.

original: ye shes rdo rje ni 'dir padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzung ste /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ni 'dir padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzung ste /
translated: Here, the vajra of wisdom is taken to be a five-pronged vajra marked with a lotus.

original: de'i lte ba'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i lte ba'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, the Blessed Buddha should be drawn.

original: de nas ci zhig bri zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bri zhe na /
translated: Then, what should be drawn?

original: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
analyzed: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
translated: In all the directions of that,

original: sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin //
translated: the great beings, according to the rite.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: This is said.

original: de rnams kyang su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyang su zhig yin zhe na /
translated: And who are they?

original: sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Śiva and so forth.

original: sna tshogs dbang phyug ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang phyug ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: The Lord of Various is the Lord of the World who is in the meditative concentration of the form of various.

original: de ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri //
analyzed: de ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri //
translated: How should he be drawn?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: He is drawn in meditative concentration.

original: de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dgod pa'i sngags gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dgod pa'i sngags gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The essence mantras of those are these, etc.

original: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir //
translated: Then, in this Dharma maṇḍala, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste bris pa'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste bris pa'i 'og tu'o //
translated: The then is in immediate succession, after the drawing.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni padmo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni padmo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: Here is in the Dharma maṇḍala of the lotus.

original: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: Having performed the extensive rite of summoning, etc., is the extensive rite of summoning, etc.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi las thams cad ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi las thams cad ston to //
translated: This shows all the activities of the vajra master as taught in the Vajra Element Tantra.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams kyang de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o zhes ston to //🔽da ni 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la @55a * //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams kyang de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o zhes ston to // da ni 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la @55a * //
translated: The phrase having introduced them in the proper way also shows that the rites for introducing the disciples of that tantra and so forth should be done in the same way here.

original: yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Now, the phrase you should not show this to anyone else and so forth

original: zhugs pa rnams kyis dam tshig ma bsrungs pa'i nyes dmigs ston to //🔽da ni de'i 'og tu de nas /
analyzed: zhugs pa rnams kyis dam tshig ma bsrungs pa'i nyes dmigs ston to // da ni de'i 'og tu de nas /
translated: shows the disadvantages of not keeping the pledges once one has been introduced.

original: de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dam tshig la gnas pa rnams kyis don gang zhig bya ba de ston to //
analyzed: de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dam tshig la gnas pa rnams kyis don gang zhig bya ba de ston to //
translated: Now, the phrase after that, the master should generate the gnosis of the disciple and so forth shows the purpose for those who keep the pledges.

original: 'jig rten dbang por snyoms par zhugs la zhes byab la sogs pas ni yang ye shes de gang zhig yin pa de ston te /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang por snyoms par zhugs la zhes byab la sogs pas ni yang ye shes de gang zhig yin pa de ston te /
translated: The phrase having entered into union with Locanā and so forth shows what that gnosis is.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed pa'o //
translated: By the yoga of one's deity, one generates the form of Lokeśvara.

original: snying gar padmo bsgoms nas kyang //
analyzed: snying gar padmo bsgoms nas kyang //
translated: And having meditated on a lotus in the heart,

original: zhes bya ba ni snying gar yid kyis padma'i gzugs bsam pa dus bzhir goms par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying gar yid kyis padma'i gzugs bsam pa dus bzhir goms par bya'o //
translated: one should cultivate the form of a lotus in the mind at the heart for four periods of the day.

original: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Then what happens?

original: padma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni //
analyzed: padma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni //
translated: If one attains the samadhi of the lotus,

original: de ma thag tu myur bar lding //
analyzed: de ma thag tu myur bar lding //
translated: one immediately flies swiftly.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽de ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so // de ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / padma de brtan par gyur pa na nam 'dod pa na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / padma de brtan par gyur pa na nam 'dod pa na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the form of Lokeśvara and the lotus become stable, one will fly through space whenever one wishes.

original: de lta ma yin na mtshan ma thob nas rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i cho gas sgrub pa la 'jug par ya'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mtshan ma thob nas rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i cho gas sgrub pa la 'jug par ya'o //
translated: If that is not the case, then after attaining the signs, one should enter into the practice by the rite taught in the second chapter of the tantra.

original: lhag ma gsum po la yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bsgom pa brtan par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la 'on te ma gyur na sgrub pa la 'jug par bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma gsum po la yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bsgom pa brtan par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la 'on te ma gyur na sgrub pa la 'jug par bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: If one has stability in the meditation on the form of Lokeśvara, one will fly through space. But if one does not have that, one should understand that one should enter into the practice.

original: da ni nam mkha'am ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi snang ba'i dngos grub ston to //
analyzed: da ni nam mkha'am ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi snang ba'i dngos grub ston to //
translated: Now, beginning with “in the sky or in another direction,” he teaches the power of invisibility.

original: nam mkha'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
analyzed: nam mkha'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
translated: “In the sky or in another direction”

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: teaches this.

original: gang du 'di sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ba'i gnas der yid gtad la sgrub pas goms par bya ste /
analyzed: gang du 'di sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ba'i gnas der yid gtad la sgrub pas goms par bya ste /
translated: In whatever place one’s mind becomes one-pointed, one should focus the mind there and practice.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su gnas nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su gnas nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
translated: Dwelling in the form of Lokeśvara, one should perform the consecration and so forth.

original: de nas padma de brtan par gyur pa dang de nyid dam gzhan du 'dug nas gal te mi gnang bar 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro bar 'dod pa des bdag gi lus rdul phra rab tu gzhig par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas padma de brtan par gyur pa dang de nyid dam gzhan du 'dug nas gal te mi gnang bar 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro bar 'dod pa des bdag gi lus rdul phra rab tu gzhig par bya'o //
translated: Then, when that lotus becomes stable, one should sit there or elsewhere. If one wishes to show the form of one who is not visible, one should destroy one’s body into subtle particles.

original: rdul phra rab kyang yid kyis cha drug gi rnam par phye nas bdag ni nam mkha' 'od zhes yid kyis bsam par bya'o //🔽de ltar padmor 'dug pa'am thogs pa'am /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyang yid kyis cha drug gi rnam par phye nas bdag ni nam mkha' 'od zhes yid kyis bsam par bya'o // de ltar padmor 'dug pa'am thogs pa'am /
translated: Having mentally divided the subtle particle into six parts, one should mentally think, “I am the light of space.”

original: zos nas bsgom na ji srid bsgoms pa de srid kyi bar du 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //🔽gal te mi snang bar brgya bar mi 'dod pa zhig yin na mthong ba dang @55b padmo'i shing rta de la zhon padmo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zos nas bsgom na ji srid bsgoms pa de srid kyi bar du 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro // gal te mi snang bar brgya bar mi 'dod pa zhig yin na mthong ba dang @55b padmo'i shing rta de la zhon padmo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, if one meditates on the lotus, whether it is placed or eaten, one will become invisible for as long as one meditates.🔽If one does not wish to become invisible, one will become visible, and riding in the lotus chariot, one will become a knowledge-mantra bearer.

original: gsum par ni gal te mi snang bar mi 'dod na de thogs pas de'i tshe ye shes can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsum par ni gal te mi snang bar mi 'dod na de thogs pas de'i tshe ye shes can du 'gyur te /
translated: If one does not wish to become invisible, one will become visible, and riding in the lotus chariot, one will become a knowledge-mantra bearer.

original: nam rtse gcig pa thob na ye shes dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam rtse gcig pa thob na ye shes dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one obtains one-pointedness, one will enter into the knowledge of the three times.

original: bzhi par gal te mi snang bar 'dod nam de zos pa de'i tshe bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzhi par gal te mi snang bar 'dod nam de zos pa de'i tshe bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes to become invisible, one will become invisible at the time of eating.

original: da ni / phyag rgya che bcings padmo ni //
analyzed: da ni / phyag rgya che bcings padmo ni //
translated: Now, the great seal is bound, and the lotus is placed in one’s mouth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su gyur ba'i dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su gyur ba'i dngos grub ston te /
translated: Thus, it shows the power to manifest various forms.

original: kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Various colors are blue, etc.

original: dbyibs sna tshogs pa ni kun nas zlum po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyibs sna tshogs pa ni kun nas zlum po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Various shapes are round, etc.

original: bris ba 'am blugs pa'i padmo sna tshogs pa de lag pas bzung nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms te /
analyzed: bris ba 'am blugs pa'i padmo sna tshogs pa de lag pas bzung nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms te /
translated: Having taken hold of that various lotus, drawn or painted, with one's hand, one should meditate on the great seal of Lokeśvara.

original: ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one's meditative concentration becomes firm, one will manifest whatever form one desires.

original: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i cho gas de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i cho gas de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: If that does not occur, then having obtained the signs, one should accomplish it in the same way by means of the rite taught in the second chapter of the tantra.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa ni ras las sogs pa la padma'i gzugs snga ma lta bur bris la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te lnga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa ni ras las sogs pa la padma'i gzugs snga ma lta bur bris la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te lnga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The second meditative concentration is as follows: Having drawn the form of a lotus on cloth, etc., as before, one should meditate like the five-faced one, abiding in the meditative concentration of Lokeśvara.

original: bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one has stable meditative stabilization, then one will display whatever form one desires.

original: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: If one does not, then having attained the signs, one should practice in that way.

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni nam mkha' 'am phyogs gzhan du de lta bu'i padma sna tshogs bsgom par ya ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni nam mkha' 'am phyogs gzhan du de lta bu'i padma sna tshogs bsgom par ya ste /
translated: In the third meditative stabilization, one meditates on a lotus like that in space or in another direction.

original: de brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de brtan par gyur na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that becomes stable, then one will display whatever form one desires.

original: bzhi par ni padma'i gzugs de lta bu la gos pa las byed du bcug la de'i steng du zhon nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi par ni padma'i gzugs de lta bu la gos pa las byed du bcug la de'i steng du zhon nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the fourth, one causes that lotus form to be made of cloth, and having mounted it, one meditates on the great seal of Lokeśvara.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, if the meditative stabilization becomes stable, one will fly in space and become whatever form one desires.

original: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas /
analyzed: 'on te ma gyur na mtshan ma thob nas /
translated: If one does not, then having attained the signs,

original: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should practice in that way.

original: na ni / gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che //
analyzed: na ni / gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che //
translated: One should practice with any great seal whatsoever.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub ston to /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub ston to /
translated: Thus, it shows the power of the powers.

original: phyag rgya gang yang rung ba gcig bcing ba ni sna tshogs gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya gang yang rung ba gcig bcing ba ni sna tshogs gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: Binding any one of the seals is the great seal that arises from the mandala of the various forms.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di la phyag rgya chen po gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di la phyag rgya chen po gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this mandala, the great seal is the principal one.

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni sems mi g-yeng ba'o //🔽legs @56a * //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni sems mi g-yeng ba'o // legs @56a * //
translated: Samādhi means the mind is not distracted.

original: bcings la zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: bcings la zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: Well bound means unmistaken.

original: padmo blangs la rab byin nas //
analyzed: padmo blangs la rab byin nas //
translated: Having taken the lotus, give it.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa brtan par byas nas phyi rol gyi padmo dngos su blangs ta gang la byin pa des dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa brtan par byas nas phyi rol gyi padmo dngos su blangs ta gang la byin pa des dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having stabilized the meditation, take the external lotus in actuality and give it to whomever, and they will be brought under one's power.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis /
translated: The second samādhi is the mandala of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: te gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya phyin ci ma log par legs par bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: te gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya phyin ci ma log par legs par bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Any one of the seals is well bound without error.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is called the pledge seal.

original: 'di ni phyag rgya chen po yang yod na ci'i phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya smos she na /
analyzed: 'di ni phyag rgya chen po yang yod na ci'i phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya smos she na /
translated: If the great seal exists, why mention the pledge seal?

original: 'dir gtso bo yin pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya smos so //
analyzed: 'dir gtso bo yin pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya smos so //
translated: Here, the pledge seal is mentioned because it is primary.

original: padmo ni sngar bsgom po goms par byas pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu yod na dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: padmo ni sngar bsgom po goms par byas pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu yod na dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If one has the practice of previously cultivating the lotus, then one should give with that very pledge seal.

original: 'on te med na len pa'i tshe ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas blangs la sbyin pa'i tshe sbyor ba ji ta bas sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te med na len pa'i tshe ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas blangs la sbyin pa'i tshe sbyor ba ji ta bas sbyin par bya'o //
translated: But if one does not have that, then when one receives, one receives with the pledge seal, and when one gives, one gives with the practice as it occurs.

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa la yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems dpa' su yang rung ba'i phyag rgya gang yang rung ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa la yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems dpa' su yang rung ba'i phyag rgya gang yang rung ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: Also, in the case of the third meditative stabilization, one should take up any seal of any hero of the doctrine mandala.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi //
translated: The virtue of the meditative stabilization

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: arises from the pledge seal.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The meditative stabilization is the doctrine seal.

original: ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term “wisdom seal” is as follows.

original: dge ba ni gsal ba ste ye shes kyi phyag rgya de gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba ni gsal ba ste ye shes kyi phyag rgya de gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: “ Virtue” means “clarity,” and the one to whom the wisdom seal is given becomes subject to the one who gives it.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas yid kyis padma dmar po su'i snying gar dgod cing bsams pa de de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas yid kyis padma dmar po su'i snying gar dgod cing bsams pa de de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: Abiding in the meditative concentration of Lokeśvara, the one who mentally places a red lotus on the heart of another, and imagines it, will bring that one under his power.

original: ting nge 'dzin bzhi pa la yang las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems dpa'i su yang rung ba'i phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin bzhi pa la yang las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems dpa'i su yang rung ba'i phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcing bar bya'o //
translated: In the fourth meditative concentration, one should bind any seal of any deity of the karma maṇḍala.

original: ldan zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa'i don to //
analyzed: ldan zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa'i don to //
translated: “ Endowed” means having the four seals.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The text says “karma mudrā,”

original: gang gis las kyi phyag rgyas padma bzung nas byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis las kyi phyag rgyas padma bzung nas byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: and the one who gives the lotus, holding the karma mudrā, will bring that one under his power.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi bslab pa ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi bslab pa ston to //
translated: Then, etc. teaches the training in the knowledge of the great seal of the knowledge mandala.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
translated: How?

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya //
translated: The great seal is accomplished in the manner of the Dharma mandala.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'di rdo rje dbyings dang 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'di rdo rje dbyings dang 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya ste /
translated: The Dharma mandala is to be regarded as connected with the Vajra Realm.

original: der phyag rgya chen po ni //
analyzed: der phyag rgya chen po ni //
translated: There, the great seal is

original: de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya /
analyzed: de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya /
translated: the seal at the heart,

original: ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bcings //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bcings //
translated: dwelling in meditative concentration, with the two hands in the vajra bond.

original: zhes ji skad bshad @56b pa de 'dir yang phyag rgya chen po yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad bshad @56b pa de 'dir yang phyag rgya chen po yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: As it is explained there, here also the great seal is to be regarded as the great seal.

original: de lta mod kyi skyil mo krung la gnas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padmo'i padmo zhes bya ba'i ming gis gzhag gi phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas bzhag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi skyil mo krung la gnas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padmo'i padmo zhes bya ba'i ming gis gzhag gi phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas bzhag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, the pledge seal dwelling in the vajra cross-legged posture is posited by the name “lotus of the lotus,” and not posited by the two hands in the vajra bond.

original: khyad par ni de tsam du zad do //
analyzed: khyad par ni de tsam du zad do //
translated: This is the only difference.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, one should explain

original: dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste //🔽zhes bya la /
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste // zhes bya la /
translated: the practice of the supreme pledge.

original: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshogs tshig phyag rgya ste rtse gcig pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi don ston pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshogs tshig phyag rgya ste rtse gcig pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi don ston pa'o //
translated: The supreme pledge is the pledge seal, because it is the single-pointedness of mind, and it teaches the meaning of meditative concentration.

original: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //🔽zhes bya bas ston te /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni // zhes bya bas ston te /
translated: In the manner of the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje dbyings su gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings su gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis te /
translated: In the manner of the Dharma maṇḍala belonging to the Vajra Realm.

original: skyil mo krung 'dug gan rgyal du //
analyzed: skyil mo krung 'dug gan rgyal du //
translated: Seated cross-legged, lying on one’s back,

original: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
analyzed: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
translated: twisting to the right, likewise twisting back,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa der ji skad gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa der ji skad gsungs pa'o //
translated: and so on, as it is taught there.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bzhag pa'i gnas de dang de rnams su 'dir phyag rgya gang yang rung ba cig gzhag par bya'o zhes de ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bzhag pa'i gnas de dang de rnams su 'dir phyag rgya gang yang rung ba cig gzhag par bya'o zhes de ston pa'i phyir //
translated: In those places where the vajra-bond is placed, one should place any suitable seal here. In order to teach that, it is said:

original: padmo'i padmo gzhag par bya //🔽zhes bya bar gsungs te //
analyzed: padmo'i padmo gzhag par bya //🔽zhes bya bar gsungs te //
translated: Place the lotus in the lotus.

original: padmo'i padmo ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: padmo'i padmo ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: The lotus of the lotus is the root of Subduer of the World.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa ste /🔽mthe bo mnyam ste btud nas ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa ste / mthe bo mnyam ste btud nas ni //
translated: This is the pledge seal of the abode of Amitābha of this very maṇḍala.🔽The two thumbs are even and bent,

original: mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgu ba //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgu ba //
translated: and the two index fingers are joined at the tips.

original: ces pa la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni padmo'i pamo'o //
analyzed: ces pa la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni padmo'i pamo'o //
translated: The remaining fingers are placed in the manner of the vajra bond: this is the lotus of the lotus.

original: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the pledge seals,

original: da ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya ston te /
analyzed: da ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya ston te /
translated: now, beginning with “the Dharma fist” and so on, he teaches the action seals.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi khu tshur gang yin pa de ni chos kyi khur tshul yin la de gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya yin te gnas ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ba bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi khu tshur gang yin pa de ni chos kyi khur tshul yin la de gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya yin te gnas ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ba bya'o //
translated: The fist of the abode of Vajra Fist of the Action Maṇḍala is the Dharma fist. That made into two is the action seal, to be applied according to the abode.

original: bstan byas la zhes bya ba ni bcings par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstan byas la zhes bya ba ni bcings par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase in the teaching means in the bondage.

original: 'di rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni rtsa ba dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni rtsa ba dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The Dharma mudras of these [deities] should be understood as taught in the root maṇḍala.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'o rgyan las padmo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'o rgyan las padmo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the Lotus family's wisdom maṇḍala, which is the third chapter in the Kosa, the Ornament of Kosala, of the Compendium of Reality Tantra.

original: // / da ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
analyzed: // / da ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
translated: Now, after the Dharma maṇḍala, from Then onwards, the Action Maṇḍala is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa yin no //🔽bskal @57a * //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa yin no // bskal @57a * //
translated: Again refers to the previously explained Action Maṇḍala.

original: pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he possesses the perfection of the eon.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig de bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gar don dang ldan pa'i ming padmo 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig de bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gar don dang ldan pa'i ming padmo 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting
translated: The pledge of the mandala of action that belongs to the family of the Dharma of all the Tathagatas, which arises from a special thought, he blessed that, and entered into and actualized the samadhi called the lotus name endowed with the meaning of dance.

original: nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: This is the samadhi that is called lotus.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: This means that it abides in the mind.

original: rang gi rig dam pa gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi rig dam pa gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal ba ste /
translated: He spoke the supreme knowledge mantra means that he uttered it.

original: 'di la sogs pa'i rig pa lnga ni bdag po lnga'i rang gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la sogs pa'i rig pa lnga ni bdag po lnga'i rang gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that these five knowledge mantras and so forth are the self-blessing mandalas of the five lords.🔽Now, beginning with the words,

original: da ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor ston to //
analyzed: da ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor ston to //
translated: Then the Bodhisattva, the noble Avalokitesvara, he teaches the mandala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The words then and so forth have been explained.

original: sangs rgyas phyogs kun zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad sdud pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyogs kun zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad sdud pa'o //
translated: The buddhas of all directions are all the maṇḍalas.

original: padmo'i mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri //
analyzed: padmo'i mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri //
translated: One should draw all of them holding lotus signs.

original: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa'i snyim par gnas pa la padmo'i phreng bas mtshan pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa'i snyim par gnas pa la padmo'i phreng bas mtshan pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: This means that one should draw all the offering goddesses, etc., in their own mudrās, standing in the hollow of the hand, marked with a garland of lotuses.

original: da ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas de dag thams cad kyi dgod pa'i rig pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas de dag thams cad kyi dgod pa'i rig pa ston te /
translated: Now, beginning with Then, one should arrange them all there, he teaches the knowledge of their arrangement.

original: de la bdag po bzhi'i ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i yang yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la bdag po bzhi'i ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i yang yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: There, one should know that the four lords are also the vajra women of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de ltar dgod pa'i rig pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dgod pa'i rig pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the knowledge of arrangement,

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i las dang de bzhin du mna'i snying po sbyin pa ni dgug pa la sogs pa ston to //🔽da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi man ngag sbyin pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i las dang de bzhin du mna'i snying po sbyin pa ni dgug pa la sogs pa ston to // da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi man ngag sbyin pa ston te /
translated: Now, from “Then, having made the vajra fist” and so on, the master’s ritual actions and the ritual actions for inducting the disciples are taught, and likewise the bestowal of the essence of mantra, which is summoning and so on.🔽Now, from “Then, having made the vajra fist” and so on, the bestowal of the esoteric instructions of the rites is taught.

original: de la reg zhig dang por de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdig ba bshags pa'i las kyi man ngag bstan pa ston te /
analyzed: de la reg zhig dang por de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdig ba bshags pa'i las kyi man ngag bstan pa ston te /
translated: There, first, from “Then, having made the vajra fist” and so on, the esoteric instructions of the rite of confessing evil are taught.

original: de yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas snog pa bshags pa bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas snog pa bshags pa bya'o //
translated: Moreover, having remained in the meditative concentration of Lokeśvara, one should confess the evil.

original: de ltang sdig pa yang dag par spyang ba bya ste /
analyzed: de ltang sdig pa yang dag par spyang ba bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should purify the evil.

original: 'dir ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bo yin par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bo yin par blta'o //
translated: Here, the great seal should be regarded as the principal.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa la ni rin po che'i rigs yang dag par @57b bzung ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa la ni rin po che'i rigs yang dag par @57b bzung ste /
translated: In the second meditative concentration, one should uphold the jewel family.

original: dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te //
translated: Having bound the supreme pledge,

original: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i tshigs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su gnas shing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽sdig pa thams cad bshags na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i tshig pa shin tu lci pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i tshigs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su gnas shing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la / sdig pa thams cad bshags na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i tshig pa shin tu lci pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te ;
translated: This is the form of Lokesvara in the Ratnavali.🔽If you confess all sins while maintaining the pledge seal, even the most serious sins, such as the heinous crimes, will be purified.

original: shin tu mi bzad las rnams byas pa dag / bdag la rnam par smad pas bsrabs par 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu mi bzad las rnams byas pa dag / bdag la rnam par smad pas bsrabs par 'gyur //
translated: Even the most terrible deeds

original: rab tu bshags dang sdog ba byas pa ni //
analyzed: rab tu bshags dang sdog ba byas pa ni //
translated: are diminished by self-reproach.

original: de dag rtsa nas 'don par ngas bshad do //
analyzed: de dag rtsa nas 'don par ngas bshad do //
translated: I declare that those who confess and restrain🔽will be completely freed from them.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang / rgyal pa ma skyes dgra bskal ba'i rab du gnas par bya dgos pa yang pho long brdabs pa tsam zhig las ma thogs so zhes grags pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang / rgyal pa ma skyes dgra bskal ba'i rab du gnas par bya dgos pa yang pho long brdabs pa tsam zhig las ma thogs so zhes grags pa lta bu'o //
translated: And it is well known that Ajatashatru, the Victorious One, who had to remain in the deepest hell for an eon, was freed in a mere finger snap.

original: de bas na bshags pa'i dbang gi de'i de zad par 'gyur bar shes so //
analyzed: de bas na bshags pa'i dbang gi de'i de zad par 'gyur bar shes so //
translated: Therefore, know that through confession, the hell will be emptied.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'dir bshags pa 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir bshags pa 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: Here, the confession is done as follows.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mdun du yid kyi kyis bsams nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mdun du yid kyi kyis bsams nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
translated: Having visualized all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas in front of you, you should abide in the samadhi of Avalokita.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang mdun du bsams la gang bdag gis tshe 'di'am tshe rabs gzhan du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las gang rtsi bgyis de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshags par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang mdun du bsams la gang bdag gis tshe 'di'am tshe rabs gzhan du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las gang rtsi bgyis de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshags par bgyi'o //
translated: And having visualized Avalokita in front of you, you should confess all the evil deeds you have done with your body, speech, and mind, through desire, hatred, and ignorance, in this life or in other lives, such as the five sins of immediate effect.

original: slan chad kyang 'di lta bu mi bgyid do zhes brjod la /
analyzed: slan chad kyang 'di lta bu mi bgyid do zhes brjod la /
translated: And you should say, “I will not do such things again.”

original: de nas snying po brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snying po brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then you should recite the essence mantra.

original: da ni 'jig rten dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i thabs ston to //
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i thabs ston to //
translated: Now, in order to teach the means of destroying all evil deeds, he says, “Now, the one called Avalokita,” and so on.

original: rang gi ye shes la sgrib pa de yang rnam pa gsum du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi ye shes la sgrib pa de yang rnam pa gsum du shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know that the obscurations to one's own intuition are also of three kinds:

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa'o //
translated: the obscuration consisting of the addictions, the obscuration consisting of the evolutionary actions, and the obscuration consisting of the results of evolution.

original: de la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa'i drag pa rnams te gang gnyen pos kyang mi bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa'i drag pa rnams te gang gnyen pos kyang mi bzlog pa'o //
translated: The obscuration consisting of the addictions is the strong addictions which cannot be overcome even by the antidotes.

original: rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa ni mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa ni mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'o //
translated: The obscuration consisting of the results of evolution is birth in the eight inopportune states.

original: las kyi sgrib pa ni gang gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las rnams te mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa ni gang gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las rnams te mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'o //
translated: The obscuration consisting of the evolutionary actions is the sinful actions whose results are certain to be experienced, such as the five inexpiable sins.

original: de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa la bar du gcod par byed pas na sgrib pa rnams su gsungs so //
analyzed: de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa la bar du gcod par byed pas na sgrib pa rnams su gsungs so //
translated: These are called obscurations because they obstruct the realization of the intuition of the universal vehicle.

original: 'dir bshags pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pas na las kyis grib pa nyi tshe gzung ngo //🔽de @58a * //
analyzed: 'dir bshags pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pas na las kyis grib pa nyi tshe gzung ngo // de @58a * //
translated: But here, since the context is confession, only the obscurations consisting of evolutionary actions are meant.

original: dag kyang snying po rnams las rnam pa bzhir ston ti /
analyzed: dag kyang snying po rnams las rnam pa bzhir ston ti /
translated: These are taught in the Essence of the Tathagata Sutra in four categories:

original: sdig pa dang / gags dang / las kyi sgrar gsungs so //
analyzed: sdig pa dang / gags dang / las kyi sgrar gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be a sin, an obstacle, and an action.

original: da ni 'jig rten dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa'i ye shes ston te /
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa'i ye shes ston te /
translated: Now, beginning with “the world’s lord,” he teaches the knowledge of worship.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi aom zhes bya ba lan mang du brjod na mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi aom zhes bya ba lan mang du brjod na mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Dwelling in the samadhi of the world’s lord, if one recites “om” many times with a mind well-equipoised, all worship is performed.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa la yang rin po che'i rigs dang 'brel pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa la yang rin po che'i rigs dang 'brel pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
translated: In the second samadhi, since it is connected with the jewel family, the samaya mudra is primary.

original: bh'um zhes bya ba tsam zhig lhag par zad do //
analyzed: bh'um zhes bya ba tsam zhig lhag par zad do //
translated: Only the word “bhum” is added.

original: gsum pa la yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: gsum pa la yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
translated: In the third, the dharma mudra is primary.

original: padmo'i phyag rgya bsgom pa nyi tshe dang he zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: padmo'i phyag rgya bsgom pa nyi tshe dang he zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The meditation on the lotus mudra and the utterance of “he” are taught.

original: bzhi pa la yang las kyi rigs la las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: bzhi pa la yang las kyi rigs la las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa yin te /
translated: In the fourth, in the karma family, the karma mudra is primary.

original: de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: “ That” is taught.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur te thams cad du snying po dang sbyar zhing padmo ci nus su bsgoms pas nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bskang ste yid kyis dbul byar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur te thams cad du snying po dang sbyar zhing padmo ci nus su bsgoms pas nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bskang ste yid kyis dbul byar bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should make offerings to all the Buddhas, everywhere, by meditating on the essence mantra and the lotus as much as possible, filling all the directions of the sky, and mentally making offerings.

original: da ni mchod pa'i rjes la dngos grub ston te /🔽rigs bzhi dang 'brel pas gang gi don du sdig pa bshad pa dang / sgrib pa yongs su zad par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pas rigs dang po la ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pas dngos grub kyi mchog ci 'dod par 'gyur par blta'i //
analyzed: da ni mchod pa'i rjes la dngos grub ston te / rigs bzhi dang 'brel pas gang gi don du sdig pa bshad pa dang / sgrib pa yongs su zad par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pas rigs dang po la ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pas dngos grub kyi mchog ci 'dod par 'gyur par blta'i //
translated: Now, after the offerings, the powers are taught.

original: gnyis pa la ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas na don gyi dngos grub dang / rgyal srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas na don gyi dngos grub dang / rgyal srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub yin no //
translated: Since one is connected with the four clans, one should see that the supreme power, whatever is desired, comes from the first clan, since the great seal is foremost; the power of the aim comes from the second clan, since the pledge seal is foremost; and the power of the kingdom, etc. comes from the third clan, since the doctrine seal is foremost.

original: gsum pa la ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas khro bo'i dngos grub gsungs su zin kyang gtsor ye shes 'grub pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas khro bo'i dngos grub gsungs su zin kyang gtsor ye shes 'grub pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the third, since the dharma seal is primary, even though the powers of the wrathful ones are taught, one should understand that it is primarily the powers of the pristine consciousnesses that are accomplished.

original: bzhi pa la ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa las phran tshogs 'grub par shes par bya'o //
