analyzed: bzhi pa la ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa las phran tshogs 'grub par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the fourth, since the action seal is primary, one should understand that it is the powers of the minor actions that are accomplished.

original: gtsor ni gzhung nyid gsal bas na ma bshad do //
analyzed: gtsor ni gzhung nyid gsal bas na ma bshad do //
translated: Since the text itself is clear, I will not explain it.

original: da ni de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ston to //
analyzed: da ni de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ston to //
translated: Now, after that, “then” and so on present the secret gnosis of the action maṇḍala.

original: gsang bar gyur pas gsang ba ste /
analyzed: gsang bar gyur pas gsang ba ste /
translated: Since it is secret, it is secret.

original: gang phyir rol gyi tshul gyis ming ston gyi /
analyzed: gang phyir rol gyi tshul gyis ming ston gyi /
translated: Since it is taught by the method of the outer,

original: sems nyid kyis byed pa de ni gsang ba zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: sems nyid kyis byed pa de ni gsang ba zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: the mind itself is explained as secret.

original: gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is secret and concealed,

original: @58b de la gsang ba de bzhi char yang spyir 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub pa'i tshon phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ma //
analyzed: @58b de la gsang ba de bzhi char yang spyir 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub pa'i tshon phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ma //
translated: In this regard, all four of these secrets are in general the mandala of the four seals of the yogin who abides in the samadhi of the Lord of the World.

original: dkyil 'khor chen por phyag rgya rnams g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yang dag par gzung ba ni sems dga' bar byed pa yin pas na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por phyag rgya rnams g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yang dag par gzung ba ni sems dga' bar byed pa yin pas na /
translated: In the great mandala, the seals are correctly held with an undistracted mind, which delights the mind.

original: bud med dang rtse ba zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bud med dang rtse ba zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be “play with women.”

original: skyes pa 'ga' zhig bud med la chags dga' ba skye ba dang 'dra ba mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yid la yang dag par 'dzin pa ni rtse ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skyes pa 'ga' zhig bud med la chags dga' ba skye ba dang 'dra ba mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis yid la yang dag par 'dzin pa ni rtse ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as a man who is attached to a woman experiences the arising of delight, so too, correctly holding the seals with an undistracted mind is called “play.”

original: de ltar 'dzin pas de la thog ma nyid du sdug bar lta bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'dzin pas de la thog ma nyid du sdug bar lta bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By holding in that way, one first sees the beauty of the seals.

original: yang nas yang du mngon sum du byas na skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs par dga' bas de bzhin du lus shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang nas yang du mngon sum du byas na skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs par dga' bas de bzhin du lus shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one repeatedly makes them manifest, in the second moment and so forth, one experiences delight, and in the same way, physical pliancy arises.

original: de nas zhes sdang ba dang bral bas lus kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes sdang ba dang bral bas lus kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, because of being free from anger, the bliss of the body arises.

original: de nas lus bde ba gyur na sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas lus bde ba gyur na sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when the body becomes blissful, the mind becomes one-pointed.

original: rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: By means of the one-pointed mind, one attains the powers as one wishes.

original: 'di ni 'dir spas pa yin te phyag rgya bzhi'i gsang ba'i ye shes su gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir spas pa yin te phyag rgya bzhi'i gsang ba'i ye shes su gsungs so //
translated: This is the expansion here, taught as the secret knowledge of the four seals.

original: 'dir yang sngags pas dang por sngags sngar spyad pa bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang sngags pas dang por sngags sngar spyad pa bya ste /
translated: Here, the mantrin should first perform the preliminary practice of the mantra.

original: mtshan ma thob pa dang / bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der bshos dang gtor ma dang / rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa'i las byas nas der zhugs la sku gzugs ston te dbus su 'dug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor du byas la skad gsungs pa'i snying pos sdig bshags pa bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma thob pa dang / bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der bshos dang gtor ma dang / rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa'i las byas nas der zhugs la sku gzugs ston te dbus su 'dug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor du byas la skad gsungs pa'i snying pos sdig bshags pa bya'o //
translated: Having attained the signs, having made the mandala for the practice, having performed the rites of worship with food offerings, bali offerings, music, and so forth, having entered there, having revealed the image, having sat in the center, having performed the yoga of Lokeshvara, one should perform the confession of misdeeds with the essence of the spoken sound.

original: de nas snying po de nyid kyis sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snying po de nyid kyis sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with that essence, one should purify the obscurations.

original: de nas mchod pa'i snying po rnams kyis yid kyi mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa'i snying po rnams kyis yid kyi mchod pa bya'o //
translated: Then, with the essence of offerings, one should make mental offerings.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should abide in the samādhi that focuses on the maṇḍala.

original: de nas dmigs pa la de la sdug ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde bas sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas dmigs pa la de la sdug ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde bas sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one will become one-pointed in mind with regard to that focus, with love, joy, and bliss.

original: de nas ni yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mngon par thob par 'gyur te 'di ni man ngag yin no //
analyzed: de nas ni yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mngon par thob par 'gyur te 'di ni man ngag yin no //
translated: Then, one will attain the desired powers. This is the instruction.

original: da ni de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po ston to //
analyzed: da ni de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po ston to //
translated: Now, after that, from “Then, ” etc., the great maṇḍala mudrā is taught.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: “Just as before” shows that

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i padmo'i thal mo dang ldan pas rang gi gnas na bzhugs pa'i rnams nyid kyi phyag rgya phyag gnyis 'dzin pa ni phyag rgya chen @59a * //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i padmo'i thal mo dang ldan pas rang gi gnas na bzhugs pa'i rnams nyid kyi phyag rgya phyag gnyis 'dzin pa ni phyag rgya chen @59a * //
translated: the mudrā of the two-armed form, endowed with the lotus añjali, is the great mudrā.

original: por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: por 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the cause of the arising of the mind of enlightenment.🔽

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston te /
translated: Then, the pledge seal is taught by “then, etc.”

original: 'gro ba 'dul pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge seal of Vairochana’s abode in the retention mandala of the subjugation of beings.

original: sor mo rtse sprad padmor bya //
analyzed: sor mo rtse sprad padmor bya //
translated: The fingers’ tips joined, like a lotus.

original: zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is taught is here the pledge seal of all the offering goddesses.

original: rdo rje'i dgos /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dgos /
translated: The vajra hook.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of the action mandala,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings ni las kyi dkyil 'khor gzung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings ni las kyi dkyil 'khor gzung ste /
translated: The vajra realm is the action mandala.

original: der rdor rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya gang dang gang du bzhag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dir yang padmo'i thal mo snying ga dang / rtsi ba logs dang / rgyab la sogs par sbyang ba'i tshul gyis gnas thams cad du bzhag na dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der rdor rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya gang dang gang du bzhag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dir yang padmo'i thal mo snying ga dang / rtsi ba logs dang / rgyab la sogs par sbyang ba'i tshul gyis gnas thams cad du bzhag na dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: There, whatever the vajra binding seal is placed, just so here the lotus palm is placed in all the places, such as the heart, the sides, the back, etc., by the method of training, and it becomes the pledge seal.

original: da ni de'i 'og tu chos kyi phyag rgya bshad de /
analyzed: da ni de'i 'og tu chos kyi phyag rgya bshad de /
translated: Now, after that, the Dharma seal is explained.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi phyag rgya bstan pa gang yin pa de 'dir tra zhes bya ba dang por spyar la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi phyag rgya bstan pa gang yin pa de 'dir tra zhes bya ba dang por spyar la brjod par bya ste /
translated: That which is taught as the Dharma seal in the Dhāraṇī of Subjugating Maras Mandala should be stated here by adding the syllable tra at the beginning.

original: gang gi phyir lha mo de rnams nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lha mo de rnams nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those goddesses are the same.

original: da ni las kyi phyag rgya ston te /
analyzed: da ni las kyi phyag rgya ston te /
translated: Now, the Action Seal is taught.

original: las kyi dam tshig gnyis byas la //
analyzed: las kyi dam tshig gnyis byas la //
translated: Having made the two commitments of action,

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi padmo'i thal mo gang yin pa de gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi padmo'i thal mo gang yin pa de gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The two that are made of the lotus palms at the location of the Vajra Fist in this mandala are the Action Seal.

original: yang dag sbyar zhes bya ba ni spyings bcas gsor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag sbyar zhes bya ba ni spyings bcas gsor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term perfectly joined means that they should be bound in the manner of thrown up with the palms joined and so forth.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the activity maṇḍala of the Dharma commitments of all tathāgatas from the Kośala Ornament, the extensive commentary on the Compendium of Principles.

original: // / da ni de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi rags kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
analyzed: // / da ni de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi rags kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
translated: Now, after that, from “Then, ” etc., it teaches the maṇḍala of the four Dharma commitments of the seal.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
translated: “ Then” means subsequently,

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la'o //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la'o //
translated: after the activity maṇḍala.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
translated: “ Again” refers to the previously explained maṇḍala of the four commitments.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ba'o //🔽rdo rje chos zhes bya ba la rdo rje chos smos pa chos nyid bzung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ba'o // rdo rje chos zhes bya ba la rdo rje chos smos pa chos nyid bzung ste /
translated: “ The Bhagavān” is as above.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: “ Vajradharma” is mentioned in the context of the Dharma commitment of the Bhagavān Vairocana, the Dharma body.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i don ting nge 'dzin @59b de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i don ting nge 'dzin @59b de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: In order to bless that, he entered into the meditative absorption called “the meaning of the name that is consistent with the meaning,” that is, he entered into that meditative absorption.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa ste phyag rgya'i snying po gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa ste phyag rgya'i snying po gsungs pa'o //
translated: “Here” means in his mind, he spoke the essence mantra of the seal.

original: 'di la sogs pa gnas lnga po'i snying pa lnga yin no //
analyzed: 'di la sogs pa gnas lnga po'i snying pa lnga yin no //
translated: This is the essence of the five places, beginning with that.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara, and so on, is easy to understand.

original: mchog ces bya bas ni 'dir sla ba 'grub par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya bas ni 'dir sla ba 'grub par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Supreme” is taught here for the sake of easy accomplishment.

original: rdor je dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rdor je dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'o //
translated: “Like the vajra realm” is similar.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po 'dra bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po 'dra bar bya //
translated: “Like the great maṇḍala” is made.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar padmo'i 'dab ma brgyad pa'i tshul du bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar padmo'i 'dab ma brgyad pa'i tshul du bya ba'o //
translated: This is the central mandala, which is like the mandala of Subduing Migra-tion, and is in the form of an eight-petaled lotus.

original: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the mandala of the seals,

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs byas pa'am blugs pa'am bris pa bzhag la dang por mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba rdzogs nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya // zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs byas pa'am blugs pa'am bris pa bzhag la dang por mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba rdzogs nas /
translated: one should place the form of the Buddha.🔽In the central mandala, one should place the form of the Blessed Buddha, either made, or painted, or drawn.

original: de gsal ba sngags ba der 'dug nas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal ba sngags ba der 'dug nas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having first completed the worship, etc., the reciter should sit there and perform the rite, visualizing that.

original: de yi zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
analyzed: de yi zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
translated: His means the central mandala.

original: phyogs rnams thams cad du zhes bya ba ni ngos bzhi char de sems dpa'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gnas su //
analyzed: phyogs rnams thams cad du zhes bya ba ni ngos bzhi char de sems dpa'i rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gnas su //
translated: In all directions means in all four sides, in the places of the Vajrasattva, etc.

original: rdo rje padmo la sogs bri //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo la sogs bri //
translated: One should draw the vajra, lotus, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mtshan pa'i padmo ni rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mtshan pa'i padmo ni rdo rje padma'o //
translated: The vajra-marked lotus is the vajra-lotus.

original: lde bzhin du rin po che dang / padmo dang / las kyi rdo rje mtshan pa'i padmo bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: lde bzhin du rin po che dang / padmo dang / las kyi rdo rje mtshan pa'i padmo bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw a lotus marked with a jewel, a lotus, and an action vajra, just as before.

original: de nas gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bsgre ba dang / mna'i snying po sbyin pa yang ston pa yin zhing dam tshig las 'dus pa'i nyes dmigs ston pas gang gi phyir shin tu gsang ba las 'grub par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bsgre ba dang / mna'i snying po sbyin pa yang ston pa yin zhing dam tshig las 'dus pa'i nyes dmigs ston pas gang gi phyir shin tu gsang ba las 'grub par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Next, from “Then, from there” and so forth, it shows the ritual of the master’s acts, the initiation of the disciple, and the bestowal of the essence mantra, and it shows the danger of violating the commitments, because one will be accomplished from the very secret.

original: de nas de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: de nas de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub ston te /
translated: Then, from “Then, from there” and so forth, it shows the powers.

original: lag pas padmo bzung nas kyang /
analyzed: lag pas padmo bzung nas kyang /
translated: Holding the lotus with the hand,

original: sgribs nas legs par bsnam par bya //
analyzed: sgribs nas legs par bsnam par bya //
translated: one should smell it well, covering it.

original: zhes bya ba ni byas pa'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byas pa'am /
translated: This is the doing,

original: blugs pa'i padmo lag tu thogs pa'o //
analyzed: blugs pa'i padmo lag tu thogs pa'o //
translated: or holding in the hand the lotus that is made or poured.

original: bsgribs te legs par bsnams par bya //
analyzed: bsgribs te legs par bsnams par bya //
translated: One should smell it well, covering it.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This shows the following.

original: ji ltar padmo de nyid las mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dri 'dra 'byung la dri des kyang nam mkha'i tshol thams cad bkang ste /🔽sangs rgyas rnams las mchod pa de lta bu'i tang ne 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar padmo de nyid las mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dri 'dra 'byung la dri des kyang nam mkha'i tshol thams cad bkang ste / sangs rgyas rnams las mchod pa de lta bu'i tang ne 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Just as from that very lotus comes forth an incomparable fragrance, and that fragrance fills all the realms of space,

original: mnyam par gzhag @60a * //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag @60a * //
translated: one should be equipoised in the meditative concentration of holding that sort of offering to the Buddhas.

original: pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //🔽gzug phud dbus /
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o // gzug phud dbus /
translated: Equipoise means to abide in the meditative concentration of Lokeśvara.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la //
translated: In the middle of the Buddha-image,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang phyug gi gzug phud kyi dbus su 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs bzhag la 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang phyug gi gzug phud kyi dbus su 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs bzhag la 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya'o ;
translated: one should place the form of Amitābha means that in the middle of the image of Lokeśvara one should place the form of Amitābha, and all worlds will be under one's control.

original: / ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: / ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'gro zhing ba spyings pa bstan nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro zhing ba spyings pa bstan nas ni // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Having displayed the gait of a goose,🔽one should gaze with eyes half-closed,

original: bsgyings pa ni lag pa ste zur du 'jog pa phyin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgyings pa ni lag pa ste zur du 'jog pa phyin par shes par bya'o //
translated: means that one should gaze with eyes half-closed, with the hands hanging down, and with a smile.

original: padmo'i padmo gzugs chen por //
analyzed: padmo'i padmo gzugs chen por //
translated: In the middle of the lotus, the great form,

original: zhes bya ba ni padmas mtshan pa'i padma ni padmo'i padmo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padmas mtshan pa'i padma ni padmo'i padmo'o //
translated: The lotus of the lotus is the lotus-lotus.

original: gang gis she na ting nge 'dzin gyis so //🔽ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na ting nge 'dzin gyis so // ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: By what? By samādhi.🔽 What is done?

original: byas nas ni zhes pa'o //
analyzed: byas nas ni zhes pa'o //
translated: Having done,

original: ji bzhin tshul du 'dug nas su //
analyzed: ji bzhin tshul du 'dug nas su //
translated: Sitting in the proper way,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya'o //
translated: one should do the yoga of one's deity endowed with the four seals.

original: yid kyis de ni gsad par bya //
analyzed: yid kyis de ni gsad par bya //
translated: One should kill it mentally.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma de gang la ltung bar byas pa de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gsod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma de gang la ltung bar byas pa de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gsod par byed pa'o //
translated: That lotus, having been made to fall on whomever, one should kill it as having the characteristics of Jina, etc., in order to subdue it.

original: padma'i rgya gram nyid du ni //
analyzed: padma'i rgya gram nyid du ni //
translated: Having made the lotus a cross,

original: byas te zhes byas ba ni byas pa'am blugs pa'o //
analyzed: byas te zhes byas ba ni byas pa'am blugs pa'o //
translated: having made it, having placed it,

original: lag pa g-yon pa yis /🔽bzung nas kyang ni zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa dang las kyi phyag rgyas legs par bzung ba'o //🔽dbang la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa yis / bzung nas kyang ni zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa dang las kyi phyag rgyas legs par bzung ba'o // dbang la sogs pa la /
translated: having taken it with the left hand,🔽 having taken it well with the left hand and the karma-mudra,🔽 one should turn it for the sake of subjugation, etc.

original: bskor ba de ni rab tu byed //
analyzed: bskor ba de ni rab tu byed //
translated: That is the performance.🔽

original: ces bya ba 'dis ni 'brus bu bstan ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis ni 'brus bu bstan ba yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the result.

original: de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag rgya gsang ba ston te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyag rgya gsang ba ston te /
translated: Then, after that, “then” and so forth, the secret seal is taught.

original: chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni //
translated: “Having become attached, all needs”

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams la mchod tu chags shing dad pas ni dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams la mchod tu chags shing dad pas ni dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: means that by becoming attached to and having faith in the seals, all needs will be accomplished.

original: 'di ni dam tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig yin no //
translated: This is the pledge.

original: de nyid kyi bsgrub par dka' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar ston te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bsgrub par dka' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar ston te /
translated: That very thing is clarified by “difficult to accomplish” and so forth.

original: bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang skad cig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang skad cig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Even the difficult-to-accomplish seal will be accomplished in an instant.

original: rnal 'byor gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de'i rang bzhin du bsgoms pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de'i rang bzhin du bsgoms pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “By yoga” means that because of meditating on that nature, everything will be accomplished.

original: 'bebs pa'i tshig gis ni 'di nyid kyi don ni snying por ston pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'bebs pa'i tshig gis ni 'di nyid kyi don ni snying por ston pa yin no ;
translated: The words of descent teach the essence of this very thing.

original: / da ni de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya bzhi po'i phyag rgya bcing bar 'brel ba ston pa yin te /
analyzed: / da ni de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya bzhi po'i phyag rgya bcing bar 'brel ba ston pa yin te /
translated: Now, from “Then, the great seal, etc.” he teaches the connection of the four seals, the great seal, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgra smos pas ni sems dpa' bzhi po'i phyag rgya bzhi po yang bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra smos pas ni sems dpa' bzhi po'i phyag rgya bzhi po yang bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: The word “etc.” indicates that the four seals of the four bodhisattvas are also to be taught.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa kos la'i rgyan @60b las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa kos la'i rgyan @60b las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the chapter on the maṇḍala of the four seals of Vinayaka from the Detailed Explanation of the Compendium of Principles, the Ornament of Kosala.

original: // / de ltar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bstan zin nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bstan zin nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the maṇḍala of the commitments,

original: da ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to /
analyzed: da ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to /
translated: now, from “Then, the great bodhisattva” he teaches the maṇḍala for accomplishing the great seal, etc.

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug ste de'i snying po yang yin par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug ste de'i snying po yang yin par gsungs pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala of subduing all beings is the Lokêśvara who resides in the samādhi called the one that displays all forms for the purpose of subduing all beings, and it is also said to be his essence.

original: yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni snying po 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ston pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni snying po 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ston pa yin no //
translated: Then, from Then, etc., it shows the maṇḍala of this very essence.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
translated: Then means immediately after,

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes la'o //
translated: after the maṇḍala of the four mudrās.

original: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor med na phyag rgya chen po bsgrub tu mi rung ba'i phyir rab tu bshad bya ba zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor med na phyag rgya chen po bsgrub tu mi rung ba'i phyir rab tu bshad bya ba zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Since it is not suitable to accomplish the great mudrā without the maṇḍala of the single mudrā, it is said should be fully explained.

original: yang dag par rab tu phya ste bshad pas na rab tu bshad pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu phya ste bshad pas na rab tu bshad pa'o //
translated: Since it is fully explained, it is fully explained.

original: ci zhig bshad ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig bshad ce na /
translated: What is explained?

original: 'gro ba 'dul pa'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul pa'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The maṇḍala of subduing beings

original: zhes bya gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya gsungs te /
translated: is stated.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba bcom dang 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba bcom dang 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the name is the mandala of the seal of the Bhagavat Lokesvara, the Tamer of Beings.

original: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be drawn?

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala.

original: zhes bya gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: ci ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor ram zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor ram zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If one asks, How is the inner mandala? it is not that.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said, The outer mandala.

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: If one asks, How is the inner mandala to be drawn?

original: de yin padmo yang //
analyzed: de yin padmo yang //
translated: It is said, That is the lotus.

original: de bzhin du ni bri bar bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni bri bar bya // zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is to be drawn in the same way.

original: padmo de la ci zhig bri bar bya zhe na /🔽der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i //
analyzed: padmo de la ci zhig bri bar bya zhe na / der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i //
translated: If one asks, what is to be drawn on that lotus?🔽It is said, There, the various seed syllables

original: sna tshogs gzung ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzung ni bri bar bya //
translated: are to be drawn, pervading all the petals.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te lte ba'i dbus su 'jig rten dbang phyug bris la de'i phyogs thams cad kyi 'dab ma thams cad du sku'i 'od zer gyi sgo nas byung ba'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dab pa'i gzugs thams cad bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te lte ba'i dbus su 'jig rten dbang phyug bris la de'i phyogs thams cad kyi 'dab ma thams cad du sku'i 'od zer gyi sgo nas byung ba'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dab pa'i gzugs thams cad bri bar bya'o //
translated: Having written Lokeśvara in the center of the navel, one should draw all the forms of the mundane and supramundane worlds that arise from the light rays of his body on all the petals in all directions.

original: de ltar bris pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
analyzed: de ltar bris pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
translated: Having drawn the mandala of the single seal in this way,

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga dang dam tshig sbyin pa bsgre bar bya'o //
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga dang dam tshig sbyin pa bsgre bar bya'o //
translated: now, from “Then, ” etc., the ritual of the master’s acts, the initiation of the disciple, and the vow should be performed.

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul pa'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul pa'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba ste /
translated: The knowledge of the training of all migrating beings is the training of migrating beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa de'i ye shes @61a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa de'i ye shes @61a * //
translated: The knowledge of the perfection of the great seal of the Lord Lokeśvara

original: de bslab par bya zhing bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bslab par bya zhing bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: should be trained in and taught. This is the meaning.

original: de la ji ltar bstan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar bstan par bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be taught?

original: de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: That is taught by “taming beings” and so forth.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas der zhugs la dbus su 'dug ste /
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas der zhugs la dbus su 'dug ste /
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala as taught, having entered there, and sitting in the center,

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la /
translated: one should confess misdeeds and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni sna tshogs 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni sna tshogs 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on the great mudra of the Bhagavān Viśvarūpa, one will become like the bearer of all.

original: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ji lta bus de bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ji lta bus de bsgrub pa ste /
translated: Then, one should teach the secret mudra gnosis of taming beings, which is to say, the mudra of the Bhagavān who tames beings, by which he is accomplished.

original: de ni yi ges ji lta ba bzhin du mi rtogs pas na gsang ba pa'o //
analyzed: de ni yi ges ji lta ba bzhin du mi rtogs pas na gsang ba pa'o //
translated: Since that is not understood by the words, it is secret.

original: de'i ye shes yin pas na gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes te sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ston to //
analyzed: de'i ye shes yin pas na gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes te sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ston to //
translated: Since it is the gnosis of that, it is the secret mudra gnosis. That is taught by “the meditative absorption of Viśvarūpa” and so forth.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs can gyi phyag rgya chen po de byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bskyed par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs can gyi phyag rgya chen po de byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bskyed par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One is Avalokiteśvara, the Great Seal of Multiform Appearance, and one should generate the consecration, etc.

original: dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la dbang po gnyis te /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya // zhes bya ba la dbang po gnyis te /
translated: The two organs are joined.

original: bdag gi dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po gnyis ro gcig par sbyar la dkyil 'khor du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid ni bdag yin no zhes the tshom med par nges par de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po gnyis ro gcig par sbyar la dkyil 'khor du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid ni bdag yin no zhes the tshom med par nges par de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The two organs are the two organs of oneself and the deity, joined as one taste.  In the maṇḍala, Avalokiteśvara is oneself. Without doubt, one should ascertain that, and it will be accomplished.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing pa rnams bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing pa rnams bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis 'di skad ston te /
translated: Now, from “Then,” etc., one should train in the binding of the great seal, etc. This is what is being said:

original: ji ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang sbyar ro //
translated: Just as in the mandala of the subjugation of beings, the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal of the Blessed Lord of the World are applied here as well.

original: dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: And the powers are the same.

original: zhes bya ba ni der phyag rgya rnams kyi dngos grub ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni der phyag rgya rnams kyi dngos grub ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that just as the powers of the seals are taught there, they are accomplished here as well.

original: de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la yang bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po phyag rgya chen po bris pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la yang bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po phyag rgya chen po bris pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: And this shows that just as the great seal of the great mandala is drawn, so it is done for the others as well.

original: phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs pas ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsgrub par @61b bstan pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs pas ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsgrub par @61b bstan pa de bzhin du /
translated: This teaches that just as the great seal is taught to be accomplished in the manner of the single-seal mandala,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshul du bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshul du bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan to //
translated: so too the pledge seal is to be accomplished in the manner of the single seal.

original: de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs pas 'di yang bsgrub pa'i khyad par mang po me do zhes ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs pas 'di yang bsgrub pa'i khyad par mang po me do zhes ston pa yin te /
translated: The phrase “will be accomplished in the same way” teaches that there are many other special accomplishments.

original: ji ltar 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya bar bstan pa de bzhin du rtog pa thams cad la yang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par shes par bya'o
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya bar bstan pa de bzhin du rtog pa thams cad la yang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par shes par bya'o
translated: Just as the accomplishment of the pledge seal is taught to be done in the manner of the single-seal mandala, so too should you understand that the accomplishment of the pledge seal in all the other tantras is to be done in the manner of the single-seal mandala.

original: // da ni rtog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungs pa de yang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis gnang ste bshad do zhes sangs rgyas kyi gsung du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // da ni rtog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungs pa de yang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis gnang ste bshad do zhes sangs rgyas kyi gsung du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to show that this thought of the Bhagavat Lokeśvara is also the teaching of those Buddhas, he says,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin pa ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin pa ston to //
translated: Then the Buddhas, etc.

original: 'di dag ni bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bshad zin te /
translated: These have been explained.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las kyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas ston pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las kyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas ston pa'o //
translated: The word good is taught by the Buddhas in terms of Vajrasattva, Vajraratna, Vajradharma, and Vajrakarma.

original: yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of their purity,

original: mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad //
analyzed: mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad //
translated: this sutra is also well-spoken.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed Vajra Vehicle.

original: ces bya bas ston te /
analyzed: ces bya bas ston te /
translated: Thus it is taught.

original: rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: The word vajra refers to the bodhisattvas,

original: ye shes ni rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: ye shes ni rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro//
translated: because wisdom arises from the vajra.

original: de rnams kyi theg pa yin pas na rdo rje theg pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi theg pa yin pas na rdo rje theg pa ste /
translated: Since those are its vehicles, it is the Vajra Vehicle.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de nyid kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de nyid kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the vehicles of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas are also taught by it.

original: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bla na med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bla na med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to distinguish it from those, it is said to be unsurpassed.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba yin par ston to //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba yin par ston to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught to be the secret of all tathāgatas.

original: ji ltar na 'di gsang ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'di gsang ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it a secret?

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
analyzed: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
translated: it is the collection of the Mahāyāna.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: theg pa chen po 'dir mngon du phyogs pas bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'dir mngon du phyogs pas bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the collection of the Mahāyāna, included in the Mahāyāna.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the commentary on the great king of tantras called “The Dharma Commitment of All Tathāgatas,” from the Detailed Explanation of the Compendium of Principles, the Ornament of Kosala.

original: // / da ni 'di man chad de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog @62a * //🔽pa ston to //
analyzed: // / da ni 'di man chad de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog @62a * // pa ston to //
translated: Now, from here on, “Then, all the tathāgatas gathered together as one” and so forth teaches the chapter called “The Commitment of the Activities of All Tathāgatas.”

original: de la rtog pa de bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rtog pa de bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa mdzad pa yin no //
translated: In order to teach that chapter, in order to request the Blessed One, Vajrasattva, who abides in the form of Vajraratna, [the gods] praise with the one hundred and eight names of all the tathāgatas.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste chos kyi dam tshig bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste chos kyi dam tshig bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: “Then” means immediately after, following the teaching of the commitment of Dharma.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngar 'dus pa mdzad pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngar 'dus pa mdzad pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The word “again” refers to the previous gathering.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: “All tathāgatas” means all buddhas.

original: 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni tshogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni tshogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: “Having gathered” means having assembled.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The one called “the jewel of consecration of all the Tathagatas” is Bhagavat Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de //
translated: He is the same as Vajradhara.

original: zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes smos pa ni 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' gzung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes smos pa ni 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' gzung ste /
translated: Here, the one called “Vajradhara” is taken to be Vajrasattva,

original: gang gi phyir 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he abides in the form of Vajrasattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen de nyid nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na nam mkha'i snying po zhes bshad de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen de nyid nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na nam mkha'i snying po zhes bshad de /
translated: The one called “the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha” is Bhagavat Vajraratna, who is explained as Ākāśagarbha because he possesses the womb of space itself.

original: nam mkha'i 'od zer gyi nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od zer gyi nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he arises from the jewel-gem of the light-rays of space.

original: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is a Bodhisattva because he is the essence of the mind of enlightenment.

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung bas so //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung bas so //
translated: By this name of one hundred and eight names means by the one that will be stated below.

original: gsol ba btab po zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu yin pas na gsol ba gdab pa zhes de skad gsungs kyi gzhan du na bstod do zhes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsol ba btab po zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu yin pas na gsol ba gdab pa zhes de skad gsungs kyi gzhan du na bstod do zhes par 'gyur ro //
translated: He supplicated means that he supplicated, and therefore it is said he supplicated, but otherwise it would be he praised.

original: nam mkha'i snying po sems can don //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po sems can don //
translated: The one who is the essence of space, the one who is the meaning of sentient beings,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab tu byed pa bco lngas ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab tu byed pa bco lngas ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ston te /
translated: The one who is the essence of space and so forth is taught by the fifteen chapters, and the one hundred and eight names are taught.

original: 'di la nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na nam mkha'i snying po ste de las yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di la nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na nam mkha'i snying po ste de las yang dag par byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the essence of space is the one who possesses the womb of space, because he is born from that.

original: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na sems can don to //🔽'di la sems dpa' tshad med pa mnga' bas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na sems can don to // 'di la sems dpa' tshad med pa mnga' bas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: The one who is the meaning of sentient beings is the one who performs the benefit of sentient beings.

original: yang na sems can gyi khams chen po'i don sgrub pa la brtson par mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: yang na sems can gyi khams chen po'i don sgrub pa la brtson par mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: The one who is the great being is the one who possesses immeasurable courage, or the one who is the great being is the one who is diligent in accomplishing the benefit of the great realm of sentient beings.

original: mdangs chen po mnga' bas na gzi chen po ste gzi ni mdangs la bya'o //
analyzed: mdangs chen po mnga' bas na gzi chen po ste gzi ni mdangs la bya'o //
translated: He is the great splendor because he has great luster.

original: rin po che yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rin chen che ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rin chen che ba'o //
translated: He is the great jewel because he is a jewel and great.

original: rin po che bzang po @62b rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pas na rin chen mchog go //
analyzed: rin po che bzang po @62b rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pas na rin chen mchog go //
translated: He is the best of jewels because he is the best of good jewels.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che yin pas na rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che yin pas na rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: He is the jewel-vajra because he is the jewel marked with a vajra.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di las ni mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di las ni mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin no //
translated: In this chapter, he is praised with seven epithets.

original: dbang bskur stsol bas na dbang bskur sbyin no //
analyzed: dbang bskur stsol bas na dbang bskur sbyin no //
translated: He is the giver of consecration because he bestows consecration.

original: tshad che bas na rin chen che'o //
analyzed: tshad che bas na rin chen che'o //
translated: He is the great jewel because he is a great measure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pas na dag pa che'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pas na dag pa che'o //
translated: He is the great purity because he is very pure.

original: dge ba rgya che ba'i sems las yang dag par byung bas na dge ba che'o //
analyzed: dge ba rgya che ba'i sems las yang dag par byung bas na dge ba che'o //
translated: He is the great virtue because he arises from the mind of great virtue.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i don du gyur pas na sangs rgyas rin chen no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i don du gyur pas na sangs rgyas rin chen no //
translated: He is the jewel of the buddhas because he is the consecration of the buddhas.

original: rin po che'i skyon dang bral bas na rnam dag sku'o /
analyzed: rin po che'i skyon dang bral bas na rnam dag sku'o /
translated: He is the pure body because he is free from the faults of a jewel.

original: rin po che rnams kyi nang na yon tan gyis 'phags pa'i phyir rin chen no //
analyzed: rin po che rnams kyi nang na yon tan gyis 'phags pa'i phyir rin chen no //
translated: It is a jewel because it is exalted by its good qualities among all jewels.

original: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na nam mkha'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na nam mkha'o //
translated: It is space because it has the nature of space.

original: de las yang dag par skyes pas na nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las yang dag par skyes pas na nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
translated: It is arisen from space because it is perfectly arisen from space.

original: spro ba'i dus su nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na nam mkha' thams cad do //
analyzed: spro ba'i dus su nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na nam mkha' thams cad do //
translated: It is all space because it pervades all space when it is emitted.

original: 'dis 'od chen po mnga' bas dngos po thams cad gsal bar mdzad pas na 'od che ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis 'od chen po mnga' bas dngos po thams cad gsal bar mdzad pas na 'od che ba'o //
translated: It is great light because it is the great light that illuminates all things.

original: nam mkha' nyid kyi rgyu mnga' bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ni rgyu'i don yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid kyi rgyu mnga' bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ni rgyu'i don yin no //
translated: It is the cause of the realm of space because it is the cause of the realm of space.

original: dngos po thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas na nam mkhar byed pa'i phyir nam mkha' kun no //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas na nam mkhar byed pa'i phyir nam mkha' kun no //
translated: It is all space because it makes space by meditating on all things as space.

original: re ba kun mchog ces pa la re ba ni phyogs la bya ste de rnams kyi mchog yin pa de la brten nas phyogs kyi cha rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re ba kun mchog ces pa la re ba ni phyogs la bya ste de rnams kyi mchog yin pa de la brten nas phyogs kyi cha rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the supreme of all hopes because it is the supreme of all directions, since it is the basis for the determination of the parts of the directions.

original: sems dpa' 'di la rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mdzod sbu mnga' bas na rin chen mdzod spu'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' 'di la rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mdzod sbu mnga' bas na rin chen mdzod spu'o //
translated: This being is endowed with a treasure-cavity of jewels, thus he is the Jewel-cavity.

original: rin po che lta bu'i bsam pa las byung bas na rin chen 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rin po che lta bu'i bsam pa las byung bas na rin chen 'byung ngo //
translated: He is the Jewel-Source, since he arises from the jewel-like resolve.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang nye bar gnas pas na sangs rgyas mdzod spu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang nye bar gnas pas na sangs rgyas mdzod spu'o //
translated: He is the Buddha-cavity, since he is situated near the Buddha's cavity.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung bas na bde gshegs rab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung bas na bde gshegs rab bo //
translated: He is the Well-Gone One, since he is well-taken by the Tathagatas.

original: rin po che thams cad 'dzin par mdzad pas na rin chen thams cad do //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad 'dzin par mdzad pas na rin chen thams cad do //
translated: He is the All-Jewel, since he is the doer of all jewels.

original: rab kyang yin la rin po che thams cad kyi mchog kyang yin pas na rab tu kun mchog go //
analyzed: rab kyang yin la rin po che thams cad kyi mchog kyang yin pas na rab tu kun mchog go //
translated: He is the Supreme of All Supreme Ones, since he is the supreme of all supreme ones.

original: 'di la rin po che'i dgos pa mnga' bas na rin chen dgos pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la rin po che'i dgos pa mnga' bas na rin chen dgos pa'o //
translated: He is the Jewel-Need, since he is the need of all jewels.

original: phyi'i 'byung khungs las byung ba'i rin po che rnams dang / de las gzhan pa nang gi rigs la sogs pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni rigs chen no //
analyzed: phyi'i 'byung khungs las byung ba'i rin po che rnams dang / de las gzhan pa nang gi rigs la sogs pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni rigs chen no //
translated: The great family is that which is the pure internal class, etc. , of all jewels, which are the external mines of jewels.

original: de rnams las kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na rin chen rigs mchog go //🔽rin po che rnams kyi @63a * //
analyzed: de rnams las kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na rin chen rigs mchog go // rin po che rnams kyi @63a * //
translated: Since it is the best of all of them, it is the supreme jewel lineage.

original: nang na drag po yin pas na rin chen drag ste rang gi gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyis rin po che gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nang na drag po yin pas na rin chen drag ste rang gi gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyis rin po che gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the most powerful of all the jewels, it is the powerful jewel, because it outshines all other jewels with its own special brilliance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
translated: Since it is the very essence of all the tathāgatas and bodhisattvas, it is all the tathāgatas.

original: rin chen ni dngos su bshad pa 'di nyid do //
analyzed: rin chen ni dngos su bshad pa 'di nyid do //
translated: The jewel is explained explicitly here.

original: thugs rin po che las byung ba nyid kyis rigs rin po che rnams shin tu khyad par du 'phags pas na rin chen dam pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rin po che las byung ba nyid kyis rigs rin po che rnams shin tu khyad par du 'phags pas na rin chen dam pa'o //
translated: Since the jewel lineages are extremely exalted due to their origin from the jewel of the mind, they are the supreme jewel.

original: nam mkha' chen po las yang dag par 'khrungs pas na nam mkha' che'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' chen po las yang dag par 'khrungs pas na nam mkha' che'o //
translated: Since it is produced from the great space, it is the great space.

original: spro ba'i tshe nam mkha' dang lhan cig mnyam par mdzad pas na nam mkha' mnyam mo //
analyzed: spro ba'i tshe nam mkha' dang lhan cig mnyam par mdzad pas na nam mkha' mnyam mo //
translated: Since it is equal to space when it is emanated, it is equal to space.

original: rgyan du gyur par mdzad pas na rgyan te aa lam ni rgyan gyi don la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyan du gyur par mdzad pas na rgyan te aa lam ni rgyan gyi don la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is an ornament because it makes one an ornament. Alam means to be an ornament.

original: mdzes pa chen por mdzad pas na mdzes pa che'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa chen por mdzad pas na mdzes pa che'o //
translated: It is a great beauty because it makes one a great beauty.

original: mdzes pa rnams skye ba'i gnas su gyur pas na mdzes pa'i 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: mdzes pa rnams skye ba'i gnas su gyur pas na mdzes pa'i 'byung gnas so //
translated: It is a source of beauty because it is the source of all beauty.

original: mdzes pa rnams kyi nang na yang mdzes par mdzad bas na rab mdzes mdzad do //
analyzed: mdzes pa rnams kyi nang na yang mdzes par mdzad bas na rab mdzes mdzad do //
translated: It is a maker of beauty because it makes one beautiful among the beautiful.

original: don thams cad sbyin pa por gyur pas na don kun no //
analyzed: don thams cad sbyin pa por gyur pas na don kun no //
translated: It is all-purpose because it is the giver of all things.

original: dri ma rnams dang bral bas na dag pa'o //🔽dag pa'i don rnams rab tu stsol bar mdzad pas na dag pa'i don to //
analyzed: dri ma rnams dang bral bas na dag pa'o // dag pa'i don rnams rab tu stsol bar mdzad pas na dag pa'i don to //
translated: It is pure because it is free from all stains.🔽It is the meaning of purity because it bestows the meaning of purity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sbyin spyod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sbyin spyod do //
translated: It is generosity because it is the essence of the perfection of generosity.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi chos rin po che'i ngo bo yin pas na chos rin chen no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi chos rin po che'i ngo bo yin pas na chos rin chen no //
translated: It is a precious Dharma because it is the essence of the precious Dharma of the thought of awakening.

original: rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas rnams te de rnams kyi dpral bar bzhugs pas na rnam dag mchog go //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas rnams te de rnams kyi dpral bar bzhugs pas na rnam dag mchog go //
translated: The pure ones are the Buddhas, and since he resides in their foreheads, he is the pure supreme one.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na dge 'dun rin chen no //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na dge 'dun rin chen no //
translated: Since he is the essence of the assembly of the irreversible thought of enlightenment, he is the jewel of the Saṅgha.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Since he is the essence of the Tathāgata who is extremely pure, he is the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur bas chen po rnams dbang bskur bar byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur bas chen po rnams dbang bskur bar byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur chen po'o //
translated: Since the great consecrations are consecrated by the consecrations of the Tathāgatas, he is the great consecration.

original: gang sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mdzad pas na 'jig rten don to //
analyzed: gang sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mdzad pas na 'jig rten don to //
translated: Since he accomplishes the aims of all the hosts of sentient beings, he is the aim of the world.

original: don rnams stsol bas rab tu dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa'i phyir don sbyin no //
analyzed: don rnams stsol bas rab tu dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa'i phyir don sbyin no //
translated: Since he bestows the aims, he is the giver of the aims, because he generates delight.

original: sbyin pa stsol bar mdzad pas na sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa stsol bar mdzad pas na sbyin pa'o //
translated: Since he bestows the gifts, he is the giver.

original: mchog tu spyin pa stsol bar mdzad pas na rab sbyin no //
analyzed: mchog tu spyin pa stsol bar mdzad pas na rab sbyin no //
translated: Since he bestows the supreme gifts, he is the best giver.

original: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na sbyin pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na sbyin pa'i mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme generosity because it is the best of all generosities.

original: 'dis sbyin par mdzad pas na gtong ba ste sbyin pa nyid kyi rnam grangs la gtong bzhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis sbyin par mdzad pas na gtong ba ste sbyin pa nyid kyi rnam grangs la gtong bzhes bya'o //
translated: It is giving because it gives. Generosity is a synonym for giving.

original: dgongs pa la dbang bskur bas na stong @63b mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa la dbang bskur bas na stong @63b mchog ces bya'o //
translated: It is the highest object because it is the consecration of the will.

original: byed pa po'i sgo nas sbyin mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i sgo nas sbyin mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the giver because it is the agent.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mdzad pas na sems can don to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mdzad pas na sems can don to //
translated: It is the aim of beings because it fulfills the aims of all beings.

original: dngos po thams cad la zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir kun no //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir kun no //
translated: It is all because it is engaged with all things.

original: dngos po thams cad rnam par rtog pa la rag las par ston pas phyin ci log las grol ba'i phyir de nyid don to //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rnam par rtog pa la rag las par ston pas phyin ci log las grol ba'i phyir de nyid don to //
translated: It is reality because it shows that all things are dependent on conceptual thought, and thus it is free from error.

original: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don mdzad pas na don chen no //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don mdzad pas na don chen no //
translated: It is the great aim because it fulfills the great aim of the multitude of beings.

original: ched kar don du gnyer ba yin pas na don to //
analyzed: ched kar don du gnyer ba yin pas na don to //
translated: It is the aim because it is the object of desire.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan bcu gcig yod de /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan bcu gcig yod de /
translated: This chapter has eleven topics.

original: de la sems can rnams kyi don 'byung bas na bsam pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de la sems can rnams kyi don 'byung bas na bsam pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king of intentions because it is the source of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: tshad med pa'i gzi brjid mnga' bas na gzi brjid che'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i gzi brjid mnga' bas na gzi brjid che'o //
translated: It is of great splendor because it possesses immeasurable splendor.

original: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of generosity because it perfects the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na tshul lo //
analyzed: tshul chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na tshul lo //
translated: It is the method because it is the nature of the great method.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston par mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston par mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: It is the Tathagata because it teaches the meaning free from error.

original: sems dpa' dpag tu med pas na sems dpa' che'o ;
analyzed: sems dpa' dpag tu med pas na sems dpa' che'o ;
translated: It is the great hero because it is the immeasurable hero.

original: / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phra rab las byung bas na sangs rgyas kun no //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phra rab las byung bas na sangs rgyas kun no //
translated: It is all the Buddhas because it arises from the atoms of all the Buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i don du brtags pas na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i don du brtags pas na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che'o //
translated: It is the great jewel of the Tathagatas because it is imagined for the purpose of the great consecration of the great jewel of all the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sgo nas bstod pas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sgo nas bstod pas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste zhes bya'o ;
translated: It is the great light of the Tathagatas because it is praised through the door of vajra splendor.

original: / rdo rje dpal gyi sgo nas bstod pas na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje dpal gyi sgo nas bstod pas na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Glorious One, because he is praised by the door of the glorious vajra.

original: rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgo nas bstod pas na bzhad chen no //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgo nas bstod pas na bzhad chen no //
translated: He is the Great Laughter, because he is praised by the door of the laughing vajra.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan bzhi yod de /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan bzhi yod de /
translated: This chapter has four names.

original: gong gi mtshan bcu gcig po de las gsum 'dir bsdu bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gong gi mtshan bcu gcig po de las gsum 'dir bsdu bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Three of the above eleven names should be understood as included here.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i don du brtags pas na de bzhin gshegs ba'i dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i don du brtags pas na de bzhin gshegs ba'i dbang bskur ro //
translated: He is the consecration of the Tathagatas, because he is imagined for the purpose of consecrating the Tathagatas.

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme, because he is the best of all consecrations.

original: che ba rnams kyang dbang bskur bar mdzad pas na dbang chen no //
analyzed: che ba rnams kyang dbang bskur bar mdzad pas na dbang chen no //
translated: He is the Great Lord, because he consecrates the great ones.

original: thams cad khyab pas na khyab bdag chen po'o //
analyzed: thams cad khyab pas na khyab bdag chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Pervader, because he pervades everything.

original: 'jig rten rnams srung bar mdzad bas na 'jig rten no //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams srung bar mdzad bas na 'jig rten no //
translated: He is the World, because he protects the worlds.

original: mgon med pa rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na mgon po'o //
analyzed: mgon med pa rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na mgon po'o //
translated: He is the Protector, because he fulfills the aims of those who are without a protector.

original: 'jig rten rab mchog ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi rab ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten rab mchog ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi rab ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: The best in the world means the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyis dbang bskur ba yin pas na 'jig rten rab mchog go //🔽'jig rten gyi bar na gnas @64a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyis dbang bskur ba yin pas na 'jig rten rab mchog go // 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas @64a * //
translated: Since they are consecrated by them, he is the best in the world.

original: pa rnams la yang snang bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten nyi ma'o //
analyzed: pa rnams la yang snang bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten nyi ma'o //
translated: He is the sun of the world because he illuminates those who dwell in the interstices of the world.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di la ni mtshan brgyad yod do //
translated: This chapter has eight topics.

original: rin po che thams cad las phul du byung bas na rin chen phul lo //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad las phul du byung bas na rin chen phul lo //
translated: He is the best jewel because he is the best of all jewels.

original: phul du byung ba rnams las kyang phul du byung bas na rab kyi mchog go //
analyzed: phul du byung ba rnams las kyang phul du byung bas na rab kyi mchog go //
translated: He is the best of the best because he is the best of the best.

original: rin po che rnams kyi rgyan mnga' bas na rin chen rgyan no //
analyzed: rin po che rnams kyi rgyan mnga' bas na rin chen rgyan no //
translated: He is the jewel ornament because he possesses the ornament of jewels.

original: rin po che rnams mdzad pas na rin chen mdzad de rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin po che rnams mdzad pas na rin chen mdzad de rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the jewel deed because he is the deed of jewels, because he performs the deed of raining down jewels.

original: nyid kyi snang ba rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pas na rin chen snang ba'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi snang ba rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pas na rin chen snang ba'o //
translated: He is the jewel light because he is the light of jewels, because he is the light of the jewel.

original: phyogs skyong ba khyab par mdzad pas na snang ba che'o //
analyzed: phyogs skyong ba khyab par mdzad pas na snang ba che'o //
translated: He is Mahāprabha, the illuminator, because he pervades the directions.

original: 'jig rten thams cad du grags par mdzad bas na rin chen grags pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad du grags par mdzad bas na rin chen grags pa'o //
translated: He is Ratnaśrī, the glory of jewels, because he makes his glory known in all worlds.

original: rin po che'i phung po'i nang na bzhugs pas na rin chen phung po ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i phung po'i nang na bzhugs pas na rin chen phung po ste /
translated: He is Ratna-skandha, a mass of jewels, because he dwells in a mass of jewels.

original: rin po che'i rang bzhin can gyi phung po mnga' ba'i phyir te byi ba'i brun lta bu'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rang bzhin can gyi phung po mnga' ba'i phyir te byi ba'i brun lta bu'o //
translated: He is Ratna-garbha, a jewel-like womb, because he possesses a womb that is like a jewel, like a mouse’s pearl.

original: rin po che'i bsam pa bzang po las yang dag par 'khrungs pas na rin chen 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rin po che'i bsam pa bzang po las yang dag par 'khrungs pas na rin chen 'byung ngo //
translated: He is Ratna-ketu, a jewel banner, because he is born from the good mind of a jewel.

original: nor bu'i don rdzogs par mdzad pas na nor bu'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i don rdzogs par mdzad pas na nor bu'o //
translated: He is Maṇi, a jewel, because he fulfills the purpose of a jewel.

original: rdo rje nor bus mtshan pas na rdo rje nor bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bus mtshan pas na rdo rje nor bu'o //
translated: He is Vajra-maṇi, a diamond jewel, because he is marked with a diamond jewel.

original: yon tan rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas na yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas na yon tan no //
translated: He is Guṇa, a quality, because he is the basis of qualities.

original: rin po che thams cad skye ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na rin chen 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad skye ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na rin chen 'byung ba'o //
translated: He is Ratna-saṃbhava, the source of jewels, because he is the source of all jewels.

original: nyid kyi 'od kyis yongs su bskor bas na sku rab 'bar ro //
analyzed: nyid kyi 'od kyis yongs su bskor bas na sku rab 'bar ro //
