original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste pris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste pris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after, immediately after the drawing.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The great maṇḍala here is the maṇḍala of all purposes accomplished.

original: nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te zhes bya ba la nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i slob dpon yin pas na nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon te dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba dang / gzhung shes pa dang /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te zhes bya ba la nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i slob dpon yin pas na nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon te dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba dang / gzhung shes pa dang /
translated: He is the one who confers initiation into this mandala, who knows the scriptures,

original: las la mkhas ba'o//
analyzed: las la mkhas ba'o//
translated: and who is skilled in the rites.🔽Just as he is means that having performed four prostrations, he confers initiation upon himself with the vase that is blessed by the vajra jewel.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te zhes bya ba ni phyag bzhi byas nas rdo rje rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pas bdag nyid dbang bskur la rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang gi snying pos bcings nas des phreng🔽ba bzung la 'jug pa'i snying po brjod nas zhugs te mi bskyod pa'i gnas na @68a * //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te zhes bya ba ni phyag bzhi byas nas rdo rje rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pas bdag nyid dbang bskur la rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang gi snying pos bcings nas des phreng ba bzung la 'jug pa'i snying po brjod nas zhugs te mi bskyod pa'i gnas na @68a * //
translated: Having bound the pledge seal of the sprout of the vajra jewel with his essence, he takes up the rosary with that seal.

original: bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po la phreng ba de phul nas slar yang blangs te /
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po la phreng ba de phul nas slar yang blangs te /
translated: Having entered, reciting the essence of entry, he offers that rosary to Lord Vajra Essence who resides in the abode of Akṣobhya.🔽Having again taken it up, he should place it on his head.

original: bdag gi mgo la de bcing zhing slob dpon gyi las thams cad kyang bdag la des mdzad par lhag par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gi mgo la de bcing zhing slob dpon gyi las thams cad kyang bdag la des mdzad par lhag par mos par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that it is tied on one’s head, and that the master performs all the rites with it.

original: de nas rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bka' nod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bka' nod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Then, having performed the self consecration and so forth, one should request the consecration and so forth.

original: 'di ni rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya ba rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya ba rgyas pa yin no //
translated: This is the extensive rite of consecration according to one’s own rite.

original: da ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ston te /
analyzed: da ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ston te /
translated: Now the rite of introducing the disciple is taught.

original: rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: “Having consecrated the disciple with the water of the vase consecrated with jewels, ” means that one should consecrate him with the water of the vase consecrated with jewels, which is recited with the essence mantra of the universal monarch, and which is consecrated with the Vajra Jewel mudra placed outside.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should one do after that?

original: rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Having formed the pledge mudra of the Vajra Jewel, ” means that one should form the pledge mudra of the Vajra Jewel.

original: rdo rje nor bu yang yin la dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang yin pas na rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu yang yin la dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang yin pas na rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig phyag rgya ste /
translated: Since it is a vajra gem and also a pledge seal, it is a vajra gem pledge seal.

original: de bcing bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bcing bar bya ba'o //
translated: It is to be bound.

original: de yang rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu zhes grags pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu zhes grags pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the vajra gem pledge seal is the one known as the vajra jewel sprout at the abode of Vajrasattva.

original: de slob ma 'ching du gzhug go //
analyzed: de slob ma 'ching du gzhug go //
translated: That is to be bound on the disciple.

original: snying po gang gis phyag rgya de 'ching du gzhug ce na /
analyzed: snying po gang gis phyag rgya de 'ching du gzhug ce na /
translated: By what essence is that seal to be bound?

original: 'di zhes bya bas ston te /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bas ston te /
translated: The word this shows that.

original: rjes thogs nyid la snying po ston pas so //
analyzed: rjes thogs nyid la snying po ston pas so //
translated: Immediately after that, the essence is shown.

original: de'i rjes la ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rjes la ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should be done after that?

original: kha dog ji lta bu'i rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: kha dog ji lta bu'i rnyed pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: It is shown by the words, with a cloth of whatever color is available, etc.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is shown.

original: rin po che'i rigs la ni nor bu'i kha dog sna tshogs pa srid pas gos la kha dog ni nges pa med de ci rnyed pa las stod g-yogs bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs la ni nor bu'i kha dog sna tshogs pa srid pas gos la kha dog ni nges pa med de ci rnyed pa las stod g-yogs bya'o //
translated: Since various colors of gems are possible in the jewel family, the color of the cloth is not definite. One should make an upper robe from whatever is available.

original: gdong g-yogs ji lta bus bya zhe na /
analyzed: gdong g-yogs ji lta bus bya zhe na /
translated: What kind of blindfold?

original: de dang 'dra bas mig g-yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bas mig g-yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: With one like that, he should be made to enter, having him say this essence-mantra.

original: zhugs nas dam tshig ma bsrungs pa de'i nyes dmigs ni 'di khyod kyis su la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ston to //🔽dam tshig gnyis su byas te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i gung mo la g-yon pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyus gtog cing rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po brjod pa de bzhin du 'dir yang g-yas
analyzed: zhugs nas dam tshig ma bsrungs pa de'i nyes dmigs ni 'di khyod kyis su la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ston to // dam tshig gnyis su byas te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i gung mo la g-yon pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyus gtog cing rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po brjod pa de bzhin du 'dir yang g-yas
translated: The disadvantage of not keeping the pledge after entering is taught by this, “You should not tell this to anyone. ”🔽Having made the pledge twofold,

original: pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus rdo rje myu gu la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus btab cing rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus rdo rje myu gu la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus btab cing rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: just as in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm, one should touch the middle finger of the right hand with the left wrathful hook, and say the essence-mantra of the vajra descent, so here also one should touch the right forefinger hook with the left forefinger hook, and say the essence-mantra of the vajra descent.

original: de nas theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus @68b pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus @68b pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite the Mahayana abhiseka.

original: de nas slob ma de la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas slob ma de la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the disciple will be receptive.

original: 'di dag ni go sla bas 'dir ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni go sla bas 'dir ma bshad do //
translated: Since these are easy to understand, they are not explained here.

original: babs nas rdo rje tshig gis dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ston te /
analyzed: babs nas rdo rje tshig gis dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ston te /
translated: Having become receptive, one should ask with vajra speech means the result is taught.

original: rdo rje tshig gis ni sgra spangs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje tshig gis ni sgra spangs pa'o //
translated: With vajra speech means having abandoned sound.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: babs pa de'i kha dang bdag nyid kyi khar lce la rdo rje bsams te ci nas kyang gzhan su sa kyang thos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: babs pa de'i kha dang bdag nyid kyi khar lce la rdo rje bsams te ci nas kyang gzhan su sa kyang thos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having become receptive, one should imagine a vajra on one's tongue and in the mouth of the disciple, and one should speak in such a way that no one else hears.

original: rtog pa 'di ni don gyi dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir thog ma kho nar gter dri ba nye bar bkod pa byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa 'di ni don gyi dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir thog ma kho nar gter dri ba nye bar bkod pa byas pa yin no //
translated: Since this imagination is the cause of the actual attainment of the goal, one should first set forth the question of the treasure.

original: gdong g-yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o zhes gad gsungs ba de nyid ji ltar bstan par bya ba gzhung phyi mas gsal bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: gdong g-yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o zhes gad gsungs ba de nyid ji ltar bstan par bya ba gzhung phyi mas gsal bar ston par byed do //
translated: The following passage makes clear how that is to be shown.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ni 'di yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ni 'di yin zhing /
translated: This is the pledge of consecration of all the Tathagatas,

original: rtog pa'i rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po'i gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po'i gtso bo yin te /
translated: and the king of contemplations is the chief of the great mandala.

original: de bas na nye bar gdags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig kyang bstan te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nye bar gdags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig kyang bstan te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, by the designation consecration of all the Tathagatas, the pledge is also taught.

original: ji srid kyi bar du bstan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji srid kyi bar du bstan par bya zhe na /
translated: For how long is it to be shown?

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Until the Blessed Tathagata is said.

original: 'dis ni rgyal po'i pho brang gi gzhung lugs bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad tha mang bstan par bya'o zhes ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyal po'i pho brang gi gzhung lugs bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad tha mang bstan par bya'o zhes ston pa yin te /
translated: This teaches that the Blessed Tathagata Vairocana is to be shown as the last one, in order to teach the royal palace system.

original: 'dir dang po ma smos mod kyi 'on kyang don gyi dbang gis shes par bya ste //
analyzed: 'dir dang po ma smos mod kyi 'on kyang don gyi dbang gis shes par bya ste //
translated: Although the first is not mentioned here, it should be understood by implication.

original: dper na rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pas dang po kho nar sgo srung la sogs pa blta dgos pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pas dang po kho nar sgo srung la sogs pa blta dgos pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, one who wishes to enter the palace of a king must first of all look at the doorkeeper, etc.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dang por rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te sgo srung bzhin bstan par bya'o //🔽de nas rdo rje bdug pa nas brtsams te phyi'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: dang por rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te sgo srung bzhin bstan par bya'o // de nas rdo rje bdug pa nas brtsams te phyi'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
translated: First, one should teach the four doorkeepers beginning with the vajra hook.🔽Then, the four outer offerings beginning with the vajra incense.

original: de nas rdo rje sgeg mo nas brtsams te gsang ba'i mtshod  pa rnams so //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sgeg mo nas brtsams te gsang ba'i mtshod  pa rnams so //
translated: Then, the secret offerings beginning with the vajra charming lady.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva,

original: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the Bhagavān Akṣhobhya.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bar du'o //
translated: Then, the Bhagavān Vajraratna, up to the Bhagavān Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Then, beginning with the Blessed Vajra Dharma up to the Blessed Amitābha.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pa'i bar du'o //🔽de @69a * //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pa'i bar du'o // de @69a * //
translated: Then, beginning with the Blessed Vajra Karma up to the Blessed Amogha-Siddhi.

original: nas sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: nas sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du'o //
translated: Then, beginning with the Vajra Sattvī up to the Blessed Vairocana.

original: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la yang 'di bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la yang 'di bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should look at the maṇḍalas of Vajradhātu and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thug gi bar du zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i don ni bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thug gi bar du zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i don ni bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the words “up to the Blessed Tathāgatas” should be understood as included by the word “up to”.

original: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i 'og tu slob dpon rang nyid dang slob ma'i gtso bo de nyid kyis yo byad ci 'byor bas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i 'og tu slob dpon rang nyid dang slob ma'i gtso bo de nyid kyis yo byad ci 'byor bas mchod par bya'o //
translated: means that after the maṇḍala is shown, the master himself and the chief disciple make offerings with whatever articles are available.

original: dgos ba thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dgos ba thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: All needs are accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bya ba dang / slob mas kyang bsgrub pa'i lung nod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bya ba dang / slob mas kyang bsgrub pa'i lung nod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: The master should perform all activities such as conferring empowerment on the disciple, and the disciple should also receive the transmission of practice, and so on.

original: de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don 'byung ba'i ye shes ston te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don 'byung ba'i ye shes ston te /
translated: After that, the following is taught by “Then, moreover, . . .” and so on, the gnosis that arises from the meaning.

original: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas nas bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya yin par shes bar bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas nas bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya yin par shes bar bya'o //
translated: The gnosis consort is the nature of meditation that is endowed with the four mudras of one’s deity yoga. The mudra that is known as the gnosis consort should be understood.

original: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che //
translated: The great mudra of the vajra essence

original: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bcings //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bcings //
translated: One should be bound by being very well equipoised.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor shin tu rtse gcig pas ma g-yengs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor shin tu rtse gcig pas ma g-yengs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should not be distracted by the yoga of one's deity with very single-pointed equipoise.

original: rdo rje snying po ni bdag yin no zhes bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ni bdag yin no zhes bsgom pa'o //
translated: One should meditate that the vajra essence is oneself.

original: gter brkos nas ni gang dag na //
analyzed: gter brkos nas ni gang dag na //
translated: Having dug up the treasure,

original: gter yod pa de mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gter yod pa de mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: one will see where the treasure is.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang du gter brko bar dri dang me tog la sogs pa byin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang du gter brko bar dri dang me tog la sogs pa byin la /
translated: This means that one should offer incense, flowers, and so forth at the place where one will dig up the treasure.

original: dang po kho nar rin chen bsngags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ma byin la /
analyzed: dang po kho nar rin chen bsngags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ma byin la /
translated: First of all, one should form the Ratnastotra mudra and offer a bali.

original: gang du gter dang rjes su mthun par brkos na der nges par mthong bar gyur te 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga'o //
analyzed: gang du gter dang rjes su mthun par brkos na der nges par mthong bar gyur te 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga'o //
translated: If one digs up the treasure in accordance with the signs, one will definitely see it. This is the rite of the Akṣobhya family.

original: da ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi ston te /
analyzed: da ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi ston te /
translated: Now, one should teach the place of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la //
translated: Having formed the supreme pledge,🔽one should offer a bali.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir phyag rgya chen po yang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir phyag rgya chen po yang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Here, one should also employ the great seal.

original: dam tshig gi mchog nyi tshe smos pa ni gtso bor bstan pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: dam tshig gi mchog nyi tshe smos pa ni gtso bor bstan pa tsam du zad do //
translated: The mention of the supreme commitments is just for the sake of teaching the main point.

original: gang na gter rnams yod 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang na gter rnams yod 'gyur ba //
translated: Where there are treasures,

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma snang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba snang ba las 'jig rten pa rnams gang na gter yod par re ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma snang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba snang ba las 'jig rten pa rnams gang na gter yod par re ba'o //
translated: means that from the appearance of the signs, such as the appearance of a change, worldly people hope that there is a treasure there.

original: der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni //
analyzed: der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni //
translated: There, if one presses the seal,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang dgos pa'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang dgos pa'i gnas su'o //
translated: means in the place of one's own need.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is the commitment seal.

original: btsir ba ni sa la bzhag la @69b sa de rab tu snyi bar bsam par bya se /
analyzed: btsir ba ni sa la bzhag la @69b sa de rab tu snyi bar bsam par bya se /
translated: Pressing means placing it on the ground and imagining that it becomes very soft.

original: aa mra'i 'bras bu la sogs smin pa lag pas btsir na tshi gu 'byung ba lta bur bsams nas btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: aa mra'i 'bras bu la sogs smin pa lag pas btsir na tshi gu 'byung ba lta bur bsams nas btsir bar bya'o //
translated: Like a ripe mango and so on, if one presses it with one's hand, a cavity appears.

original: des rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Imagining it like that, one presses it.

original: da ni padma'i rigs la brten nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
analyzed: da ni padma'i rigs la brten nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
translated: Now, based on the lotus family, the vajra essence and so on are taught.

original: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du //
translated: In the samadhi of the vajra essence,

original: shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni //
translated: If one meditates on the sameness of all things,

original: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas la mi g-yeng ba'i yid kyis bsgoms na gter gang na gnas pa shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas la mi g-yeng ba'i yid kyis bsgoms na gter gang na gnas pa shes par 'gyur te /
translated: one will know where the treasure is.

original: 'dir ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bo yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bo yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, one should understand that the Dharma seal is primary.🔽By the vajra-essence meditative stabilization, etc.,

original: rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni las kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i sbyor ba ston te /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni las kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i sbyor ba ston te /
translated: he teaches the application belonging to the Action family.

original: 'dir yang rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa de bzhin du byas la phyogs gang du gter yod par re ba der 'chag cing 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa de bzhin du byas la phyogs gang du gter yod par re ba der 'chag cing 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: Here also, one should perform the vajra-essence meditative stabilization endowed with the four seals, and one should walk about and go to the direction where one hopes the treasure is.

original: gnas gang du de 'bebs par 'gyur ba de na gter yod do zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas gang du de 'bebs par 'gyur ba de na gter yod do zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that where one deposits it, there the treasure is.

original: 'dir ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bo yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bo yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, one should understand that the Action seal is primary.

original: sbyor ba 'di bzhi char la yang zla ba bzhi'i bar du thun bzhir phyag rgya bsgom zhing dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba'am tha na zla ba gcig gi bar du dang por sngon du bsnyen pa byas la gang na gter yod par re
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di bzhi char la yang zla ba bzhi'i bar du thun bzhir phyag rgya bsgom zhing dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba'am tha na zla ba gcig gi bar du dang por sngon du bsnyen pa byas la gang na gter yod par re
translated: In all four of these applications, one should meditate on the seal for four months in four sessions, and make offerings with perfume, flowers, and so on, or at least for one month.

original: ba der song nas sa yongs su sbyang ba byas te 'byor pa yod na dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba der song nas sa yongs su sbyang ba byas te 'byor pa yod na dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Having first performed the preliminary propitiation, one should go to where one hopes the treasure is, purify the site, and if one has the means, one should draw the maṇḍala.

original: gal te ma 'byor na dri dang me tog dang phreng ba la sogs pa byin la sbyor ba 'di rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te ma 'byor na dri dang me tog dang phreng ba la sogs pa byin la sbyor ba 'di rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: If one does not have the means, one should give perfume, flowers, garlands, and so on, and accomplish these applications.

original: 'di dag ni 'og nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba gzhan rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'og nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba gzhan rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: These should be understood for the other applications explained below.

original: phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni //
translated: If one meditates on the great seal,🔽and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of one’s deity in the same way,

original: gang na gter yod par re bde ra sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'chag par bya'o //
analyzed: gang na gter yod par re bde ra sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'chag par bya'o //
translated: one should walk in equipoise, hoping to where the treasure is.

original: gang du lus ni 'khor gyur ba //
analyzed: gang du lus ni 'khor gyur ba //
translated: Wherever the body turns,🔽one should know that there is a treasure of the nature of jewels.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas gang du lus 'khor bar gyur pa der ni rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi gter yod bar shes par bya ste khyad par ni 'dir de yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas gang du lus 'khor bar gyur pa der ni rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi gter yod bar shes par bya ste khyad par ni 'dir de yin no //
translated: This is the special feature here.

original: dam tshig nyid kyis zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: dam tshig nyid kyis zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: By means of the pledge itself,

original: dam tshig bsrungs pas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ste 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs pas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ste 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: this shows that the activities are accomplished by means of the observance of the pledge, not otherwise. This is the application of the Akṣhobhya family.

original: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
translated: Having bound the supreme pledge,

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o//
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o//
translated: as before,

original: @70a * // gang du bsams nas gnyis gyur pa //
analyzed: @70a * // gang du bsams nas gnyis gyur pa //
translated: wherever one thinks,

original: zhes bya ba ni gter gang na yod du re ba'i gnas der 'chag pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang du rang nyid 'bye zhing dbang med par gnyis su gyur pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gter gang na yod du re ba'i gnas der 'chag pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang du rang nyid 'bye zhing dbang med par gnyis su gyur pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: one should know that there is a treasure where one walks and the pledge seal splits open by itself, powerless not to.

original: sbyor ba gsum pa la yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur par bsgom zhing gter yod par re ba'i gnas gang yin pa der rin po che'i gter rang nyid smra bar 'gyur ro //🔽sbyor ba bzhi pa la yang las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas te yod du re ba'i gnas su 'chag par byas na gang du lag pa la babs pas las kyi phyag rgya rang grol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
analyzed: sbyor ba gsum pa la yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur par bsgom zhing gter yod par re ba'i gnas gang yin pa der rin po che'i gter rang nyid smra bar 'gyur ro // sbyor ba bzhi pa la yang las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas te yod du re ba'i gnas su 'chag par byas na gang du lag pa la babs pas las kyi phyag rgya rang grol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
translated: Also, in the third application, one meditates with the Dharma seal as the main practice, and wherever there is hope for a treasure, one will speak of a precious treasure.

original: par gyur pa de na yod pa yin no //
analyzed: par gyur pa de na yod pa yin no //
translated: Also, in the fourth application, one performs the yoga of one’s deity with the action seal as the main practice, and wherever there is hope for a treasure, one walks there. Wherever one’s hand falls, the action seal is self-liberated, and the pledge seal is bound there.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having meditated on the great seal,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes shes par bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes shes par bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: and so on. The knowledge of wisdom is the yoga of one’s deity endowed with the four seals.

original: phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pas gang na yod par re ba der bsgoms na sngar bshad pa'i tshul bzhin der de'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pas gang na yod par re ba der bsgoms na sngar bshad pa'i tshul bzhin der de'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If one meditates on the place where one hopes to find the treasure, the gnosis of that will arise there, in the way previously explained.

original: gnyis par yang dam tshig phyag rgya grol bas gter kha bye bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis par yang dam tshig phyag rgya grol bas gter kha bye bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: In the second, one should know that the treasure will open by releasing the pledge seal.

original: gsum par yang ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dgos pa'i gnas su bsgoms na nges par 'di na gter yod do zhes ye shes skye bar gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum par yang ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dgos pa'i gnas su bsgoms na nges par 'di na gter yod do zhes ye shes skye bar gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the third, if one meditates on the place where the concentration seal is needed, the gnosis that “there is a treasure here” will definitely arise.

original: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya bya'o //
translated: In the fourth, one should perform the action seal.

original: sbyor ba bzhi par yang yod par re ba'i gnas su las kyi phyag rgya gtso cher bcings nas gang du bye ba de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba bzhi par yang yod par re ba'i gnas su las kyi phyag rgya gtso cher bcings nas gang du bye ba de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the fourth application, one should know that the treasure is where the action seal is released, having been mainly bound in the place where one hopes to find the treasure.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: “The great seal” and so on are as before.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas gang du babs par gyur pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas gang du babs par gyur pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: Wherever one falls while meditating on the great seal, one should know that there is a treasure there.

original: sbyor ba gnyis par yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor byas pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par gyur na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis par yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor byas pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par gyur na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the second union, one should know that there is a treasure wherever the pledge seal is displayed, since the pledge seal is primary.

original: gsum par yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas gang du ye shes skyes pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum par yang chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas gang du ye shes skyes pa de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the third, one should know that there is a treasure wherever pristine awareness arises, since the doctrine seal is primary.

original: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas gang du 'chag pa na las kyi phyag rgya 'khor bar gyur pa nye bar skye ba de na gter yod pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas gang du 'chag pa na las kyi phyag rgya 'khor bar gyur pa nye bar skye ba de na gter yod pa ston pa yin no //
translated: In the fourth, one should know that there is a treasure wherever the action seal arises, since the action seal is primary.

original: rab tu byed pa 'dir yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @70b pa 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi ni dang po bzhi yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'dir yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @70b pa 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi ni dang po bzhi yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: In this chapter, one should know that the four cakravartins, Vajrasattva and so forth, are the first four.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa rnams kyi ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa rnams kyi ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the second four are the second four.

original: gsum pa rnams kyi ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa rnams kyi ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is for those of the third,

original: bzhi pa rnams kyi ni bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: bzhi pa rnams kyi ni bzhi pa ste //
translated: and the fourth is for those of the fourth.

original: de ltar na sbyor ba bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyor ba bcu drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus there are sixteen applications.

original: 'dir ji lta bde bzhin du rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang 'og nas bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ji lta bde bzhin du rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang 'og nas bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, just as it is, one should understand it for the maṇḍalas of the vajra realm and so forth, and for the maṇḍalas explained below.🔽Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba ni sgas pa la bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba ni sgas pa la bya'o //
translated: The secret is to be understood as the secret place.

original: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of that is the secret seal.

original: de'i ye shes te de bslab pa ni bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i ye shes te de bslab pa ni bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The knowledge of that, the training in that, is taught.🔽Now,

original: da ni / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la //
analyzed: da ni / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la //
translated: in the union of the two organs,🔽etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsang ba de ston te bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su yongs su bskyed la lha gang yin pa yang der bzhugs par bya ste 'di ni gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsang ba de ston te bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su yongs su bskyed la lha gang yin pa yang der bzhugs par bya ste 'di ni gnyis so //
translated: That secret is taught. Having fully generated oneself into the form of the great seal, one should cause the deity to reside there. This is the two.

original: gnyis po 'di'i dbang po gnyis ni dbang po gnyis te dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di'i dbang po gnyis ni dbang po gnyis te dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: The two organs are the two organs of the two, that is, the eye and so on.

original: de rnams mnyam par sbyor ba ni ro gcig bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams mnyam par sbyor ba ni ro gcig bar gyur pa ste /
translated: Their union is their becoming of one taste.🔽The great seal is generated, and one's deity is summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled.

original: phyag rgya chen po bskyed la rang gi lha dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya bas bdag gang yin pa de ni bdag gi lha yin la bdag gi lha gang yin pa de ni bdag go zhes de ltar ro gcig par gyur pa'i dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor bas phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na bab par gyur na gter
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bskyed la rang gi lha dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya bas bdag gang yin pa de ni bdag gi lha yin la bdag gi lha gang yin pa de ni bdag go zhes de ltar ro gcig par gyur pa'i dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor bas phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na bab par gyur na gter
translated: One should meditate on the great seal, thinking, I am my deity, and my deity is I, and the two organs become of one taste.🔽 If it descends, one finds a treasure.

original: rnyed do zhes bya ba babs pa ni mngon par zhen pa ste brtan por gzung ba'o //
analyzed: rnyed do zhes bya ba babs pa ni mngon par zhen pa ste brtan por gzung ba'o //
translated: To descend means to adhere, to firmly grasp.

original: de lta bu'i mngon par zhen pas nges par gter rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mngon par zhen pas nges par gter rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By such adherence, one certainly finds a treasure. This is the meaning.

original: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ste de nyid ni bud med do //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ste de nyid ni bud med do //
translated: The supreme pledge and so forth: the binding of the pledge seal, which is the woman herself.

original: de dang rtse ba ni sems brtan par byed pa de yul gzhan la bsgyur mi ster bar de nyid la dga' ba bskyed pa'o //🔽gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa //
analyzed: de dang rtse ba ni sems brtan par byed pa de yul gzhan la bsgyur mi ster bar de nyid la dga' ba bskyed pa'o // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa //
translated: Playing with her is the stabilization of the mind, not allowing it to be diverted to other objects, and generating delight in her alone.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang du dam tshig gi phyag rgya de dgrol bar 'dod kyang dgrol bar mi nus pa de i brten pa gyur pa yin te 'di gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na gter yod pa yin par ston to //🔽gsum par / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang du dam tshig gi phyag rgya de dgrol bar 'dod kyang dgrol bar mi nus pa de i brten pa gyur pa yin te 'di gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na gter yod pa yin par ston to // gsum par / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
translated: Where the pledge is firm means that where the pledge seal is such that one wishes to release it but cannot, that is a firm pledge, and it indicates that a treasure is there.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: In the third verse, the two organs are joined and so forth is easy to understand.

original: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya de 'dzin bzhin du dbang med par byed par gyur pa de na gter yod par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhi par yang las kyi phyag rgya de 'dzin bzhin du dbang med par byed par gyur pa de na gter yod par ston pa yin no //
translated: In the fourth verse, the treasure is there indicates that where the action seal is held and one becomes powerless, a treasure is there.

original: sngar phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor ba bcu drag bstan pa la phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor ba la yang @71a * //
analyzed: sngar phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor ba bcu drag bstan pa la phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor ba la yang @71a * //
translated: Previously, the sixteen applications of the four seals were taught.  In the applications of the four seals,

original: rang gi lha dgug pa la sogs pa byas mod kyi ji srid tha mi dad pa la sogs par lhag par mos par ma byas pa de srid du dgos pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba 'di bzhi
analyzed: rang gi lha dgug pa la sogs pa byas mod kyi ji srid tha mi dad pa la sogs par lhag par mos par ma byas pa de srid du dgos pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba 'di bzhi
translated: one should summon one's deity and so forth, but as long as one does not imagine non-difference and so forth, the purpose will not be accomplished.  In order to teach this meaning, one should understand that these four applications

original: nye bar dgod par mdzad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar dgod par mdzad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: are set forth.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this in the same way for others.

original: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs par mdzad nas //
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs par mdzad nas //
translated: Thus, having completed the rite of accomplishment of the four seals,

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyag rgya de bzhin nor bu'i rigs yin par ston to //
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyag rgya de bzhin nor bu'i rigs yin par ston to //
translated: now, from then and so forth, it teaches that those seals are of the jewel family.

original: de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba la /
translated: Then, one should teach the knowledge of the seals of the great jewel family.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste las bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste las bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then is in immediate succession, after the teaching of the rites.

original: nor bu'i rigs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na nor bu'i rigs chen po'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na nor bu'i rigs chen po'o //
translated: Since it is a jewel family and also great, it is the great jewel family.

original: nor bu'i rigs chen po de'i phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs chen po de'i phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: All the seals of that great jewel family are the four kinds of seals.

original: de'i ye shes yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i ye shes yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so //
translated: Since it is the intuition of all those seals, it is the intuition of all seals.

original: de bslab po zhes bya ba ni de nyid nye bar ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bslab po zhes bya ba ni de nyid nye bar ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should train in that is the teaching of just that.

original: phyag rgya rnams pa bzhi'i nang na yang phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa yin pas na de dang po nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnams pa bzhi'i nang na yang phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa yin pas na de dang po nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Since the great seal is the chief among the four kinds of seals, in order to teach that first, it says, Then, the great seal is this.

original: de ji lta bur 'byung ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ji lta bur 'byung ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach what it is like, it says:

original: ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin //
analyzed: ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin //
translated: Just like the drawing.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni ;🔽/ zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni ;🔽/ zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Having cultivated the great seal,

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas slob dpon gyis lha'i sku ji lta bur bstan pa de lta bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas slob dpon gyis lha'i sku ji lta bur bstan pa de lta bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having entered the mandala, one should meditate on oneself in the form of the deity just as the master has revealed the body of the deity.

original: ci'i phyir gzugs de bsgom zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzugs de bsgom zhe na /
translated: Why should one meditate on that form?

original: don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: One will accomplish all the supreme goals.

original: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i spyir bstan pa rnams kyi so so'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i spyir bstan pa rnams kyi so so'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Now, in order to teach the individual results of the general teachings of the great seal, it is said, “Next, these are the actions of the great seals.”

original: de la re zhig thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: de la re zhig thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: Therein, first of all, the result of meditating on the great seal of Buddha is taught:

original: sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid //🔽ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid // ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The seal of Buddha is Buddhahood itself.

original: rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab grub //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab grub //
translated: The Vajra Essence is the complete attainment of the two.

original: ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa'i lha de nyid bzung ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa'i lha de nyid bzung ste /
translated: This is the abode of Akṣobhya, and the deity who is the seal of the abode of Vajrasattva.

original: gnyis rab grub ces bya ba ni grub pa bzang po yin pas na rab grub pa ste dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis rab grub ces bya ba ni grub pa bzang po yin pas na rab grub pa ste dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The best of accomplishments is excellent accomplishment, which is to say, the supreme feat.

original: rin @71b chen lcags kyu la sogs pa phyag rgya gsum gyi 'bras bu ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rin @71b chen lcags kyu la sogs pa phyag rgya gsum gyi 'bras bu ni go sla'o //
translated: The results of the three seals, the jewel hook, etc., are easy to understand.

original: nor bu lta bas nor 'phrog pa //
analyzed: nor bu lta bas nor 'phrog pa //
translated: The jewel gaze takes away wealth.

original: zhes bya ba la 'di'i 'bras bu nor 'gugs pa nyid yin par ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'di'i 'bras bu nor 'gugs pa nyid yin par ston te /
translated: This shows that the result of this is the summoning of wealth.

original: phyag rgya 'di ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi'o //
translated: This seal is of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest are easy to understand.

original: rin chen bshad pas nor 'phrog 'gyur//
analyzed: rin chen bshad pas nor 'phrog 'gyur//
translated: The jewel explanation takes away wealth.

original: zhes bya ba la 'di'i 'bras bu yang nor 'dres pa yin par ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'di'i 'bras bu yang nor 'dres pa yin par ston te /
translated: This shows that the result of this is the summoning of wealth.

original: dgod pa'i bzhin gyis gang yang rung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa des nor sbyin par 'gyur bas na 'di'i 'bras bu nor 'gugs pa yin par gsungs so //
analyzed: dgod pa'i bzhin gyis gang yang rung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa des nor sbyin par 'gyur bas na 'di'i 'bras bu nor 'gugs pa yin par gsungs so //
translated: The result of this is the acquisition of wealth, since by means of the face of laughter, one honors anyone at all and they give one wealth.

original: rin chen chos kyis chos kyang 'thob //
analyzed: rin chen chos kyis chos kyang 'thob //
translated: The Dharma is obtained through the Dharma jewel.

original: ces bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de bsgoms na phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur bas na de'i phyir 'di phyin ci ma log pa'i chos ston par 'gyur te 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de bsgoms na phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur bas na de'i phyir 'di phyin ci ma log pa'i chos ston par 'gyur te 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no
translated: The result of this is the teaching of the undistorted Dharma, since the undistorted intuition arises when one cultivates the seal of the abode of Amitabha.

original: // gtong ba'i mchog gis dam pa rnyed //
analyzed: // gtong ba'i mchog gis dam pa rnyed //
translated: The supreme gift obtains the supreme.

original: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas kyi phyag rgya ni gtong ba'i mchog ste de'i rnyed pa ni 'bras bu'i mchog nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas kyi phyag rgya ni gtong ba'i mchog ste de'i rnyed pa ni 'bras bu'i mchog nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The seal of the abode of Lokesvara is the supreme gift, and the result of this is the attainment of the supreme.

original: rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po //
analyzed: rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po //
translated: The great treasure is obtained through the jewel sword.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnon po'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni rin chen ral gri'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnon po'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni rin chen ral gri'o //
translated: The seal of the abode of the Blessed Vajra Sharpness is the jewel sword.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni mdzod chen po ste nor mdzod spel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni mdzod chen po ste nor mdzod spel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Its result is the great treasure, the increase of the treasure of wealth.

original: de yang gang gi phyir sa bdag ral gri 'byin pa rnams kyi nor mdzod 'phel bar 'gyur ba bzhin du shes rab kyi ral gri rang bzhin can gyi blo dang ldan pa rnams ni nor 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir sa bdag ral gri 'byin pa rnams kyi nor mdzod 'phel bar 'gyur ba bzhin du shes rab kyi ral gri rang bzhin can gyi blo dang ldan pa rnams ni nor 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: And that is so because, just as the treasure of wealth increases for those who draw the sword of the earth, so the treasure of wealth increases for those who have the sword of wisdom.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po //
analyzed: rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po //
translated: the great treasure is by the jewel sword.

original: zhes bya'o // nor bu'i 'khor los bdag por 'gyur //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // nor bu'i 'khor los bdag por 'gyur //
translated: One becomes a lord by the jewel wheel.

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni nor bu'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni nor bu'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The seal of the abode of the vajra wheel is the jewel wheel.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Its result is becoming a lord of a kingdom and so forth.

original: smras pas btsal ba'i dngos grub thob //
analyzed: smras pas btsal ba'i dngos grub thob //
translated: One obtains the power of speech by the jewel speech.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni smra ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ni smra ba'o //
translated: The seal of the abode of Vajra Speech is speech.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The result is the attainment of the desired goal.

original: des rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje'i lce bdag dang sbyin pa po gnyi ga'i khar bsams nas dri dang me tog la sogs pa byin te /
analyzed: des rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje'i lce bdag dang sbyin pa po gnyi ga'i khar bsams nas dri dang me tog la sogs pa byin te /
translated: Having performed one's deity yoga, one should imagine a vajra tongue in the mouths of both oneself and the donor, and offer scents, flowers, and so forth.🔽Reciting the essence mantra a hundred or a thousand times, one should not speak with others, but rather say to the one from whom one seeks a boon, Please give this to me.

original: snying po brgya stong bzlas la gzhan dang lhan cig smra bar mi byed par gang la bslang bar bya ba de nyid la dang por che ge mo nga la byin cig ces smras na nges par ster bar 'gyur ro //🔽rin chen char gyis nor chen po //🔽zhes bya ba la 'di ni gdon @72a * //
analyzed: snying po brgya stong bzlas la gzhan dang lhan cig smra bar mi byed par gang la bslang bar bya ba de nyid la dang por che ge mo nga la byin cig ces smras na nges par ster bar 'gyur ro // rin chen char gyis nor chen po // zhes bya ba la 'di ni gdon @72a * //
translated: If one says this, one will certainly be given whatever one seeks.

original: mi za bar grub pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: mi za bar grub pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The great wealth of a rain of jewels means that one should perform the mudra of the abode of unfailing accomplishment.

original: 'dir yang de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul te /
analyzed: 'dir yang de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul te /
translated: Here, too, one should perform one's deity yoga, offer scents, flowers, and so forth,🔽and recite the essence mantra a hundred or a thousand times.

original: rang gi khyim gyi dbus su 'dug la rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag la nor gyi char pa phob shig ces thun bzhir sbyor bas nor thams cad kyi char 'bebs par bsam pa nyin re zhing thun bzhi bzhir byas na de'i 'og tu
analyzed: rang gi khyim gyi dbus su 'dug la rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag la nor gyi char pa phob shig ces thun bzhir sbyor bas nor thams cad kyi char 'bebs par bsam pa nyin re zhing thun bzhi bzhir byas na de'i 'og tu
translated: If one does this in four sessions, thinking that it makes it rain all wealth, and does this every day in four sessions, then

original: nor che bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor che bar 'gyur ro //
translated: after that one will become wealthy.

original: nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid //
analyzed: nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid //
translated: Worship with jewels, and you will be worshipped.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje las kyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje las kyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is the mudra of the abode of Vajrakarma.

original: 'dis kyang snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa nyed 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis kyang snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa nyed 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one worships the Tathagatas with this, as before, one will obtain the worship of all worlds.

original: rin chen go chas brtan par byed //
analyzed: rin chen go chas brtan par byed //
translated: Make it stable with the jewel armor.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje srung ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ste go cha bcings pas rdo rje'i lus su byed pas na de'i phyir brtan par byed ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje srung ba'i gnas kyi phyag rgya ste go cha bcings pas rdo rje'i lus su byed pas na de'i phyir brtan par byed ces gsungs so //
translated: This is the mudra of the abode of Vajravarman. By binding the armor, one makes it a vajra body. Therefore, it is said to make it stable.

original: rin chen mche bas nor 'phrog go //
analyzed: rin chen mche bas nor 'phrog go //
translated: The jewel fangs take away wealth.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is the seal of the abode of Vajrayakṣa.

original: 'di bsgoms pa nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten gyi nor sbyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bsgoms pa nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten gyi nor sbyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: By meditating on this, one will obtain the wealth of the world of the gods.

original: khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob //
analyzed: khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob //
translated: The fist jewel obtains power.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is the seal of the abode of Vajramuṣṭi.

original: 'di bsgoms pas de la bgegs kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur bas na /🔽khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob //
analyzed: 'di bsgoms pas de la bgegs kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur bas na / khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob //
translated: By meditating on this, one will not be harmed by obstacles.

original: ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The fist jewel obtains power.”

original: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the complete maṇḍala of the great seal,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston par bzheng pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston par bzheng pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to teach the pledge seal, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: “Next, in this great maṇḍala,🔽one should draw the pledge seal.”

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i yi shes ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i yi shes ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The knowledge of the pledge seal is as follows.

original: dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste de'i ye shes yin pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste de'i ye shes yin pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
translated: The pledge seal is the pledge seal, and since it is the intuition of that, it is the intuition of the pledge seal.

original: de 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni lung dbog pa'i dus la babs pas na de 'di yin no zhes ston pa'o //
analyzed: de 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni lung dbog pa'i dus la babs pas na de 'di yin no zhes ston pa'o //
translated: This is it is the teaching of this is it since the time of the prediction has arrived.

original: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje rin chen ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das te de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje rin chen ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das te de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra jewel, etc. The Blessed One who is taught in the Vajra Element Mandala is the vajra jewel, and the seal of that is the vajra jewel seal.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob //
translated: One obtains consecration of all buddhas

original: ces bya ba 'dis ni de'i las ston pa yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis ni de'i las ston pa yin te /
translated: This shows its function.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas nas mthe bo gnyis sbrel la gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas nas mthe bo gnyis sbrel la gzhag pa ste /
translated: Its seal is made by forming the two index fingers into jewels from the vajra binding, and placing them with the two thumbs joined.

original: 'di @72b yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di @72b yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be known as the abode of the Blessed One Vairochana.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas su yang 'di nyid 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang 'di nyid yin na //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i gnas su yang 'di nyid 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang 'di nyid yin na //
translated: This is also the pledge seal for entering the mandala of Vajra- sattva.

original: rdo rje nor bu che bcings na //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu che bcings na //
translated: Binding the great vajra gem,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid kyi 'bras bu ston to //🔽rdo rje gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje gnyis ni khro bo'i khu tshur bcings te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid kyi 'bras bu ston to // rdo rje gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje gnyis ni khro bo'i khu tshur bcings te /
translated: and so forth, it shows the result of that.🔽 As for the two vajras, and so forth, the two vajras are the two threatening gestures,

original: de gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas la rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas la rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: and the two thumbs are made into gems.

original: 'dis ni de'i 'bras bu ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i 'bras bu ston to //
translated: This shows the result of that.

original: phyag rgya 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas kyi yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas kyi yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be known as the seal of Akshobhya's abode.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje khro po'i khu tshur de nyid las rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya bsgrengs pa mthe bo gnyis kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje khro po'i khu tshur de nyid las rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya bsgrengs pa mthe bo gnyis kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: The same vajra fist of the wrathful one, with the two thumbs forming a vajra, is the mudra of the abode of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: sbyin te zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'bras bu ston to //
analyzed: sbyin te zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'bras bu ston to //
translated: The word give indicates the result.

original: mdzub gnyis padmo'i nor bu bcings //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis padmo'i nor bu bcings //
translated: The two index fingers are bound like a gem in a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba 'di khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis po nyid nor bur bcings pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis po nyid nor bur bcings pa ste /
translated: This is the binding of the two wrathful index fingers like a gem.

original: tshigs gsum pa cung zad bkug la padmo kha ma bye ba lta bur bya ba 'di ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽'jig rten dbang gi nor sbyin 'gyur /
analyzed: tshigs gsum pa cung zad bkug la padmo kha ma bye ba lta bur bya ba 'di ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyag rgya'o // 'jig rten dbang gi nor sbyin 'gyur /
translated: The third joint is slightly bent, and the two fingers are like an unopened lotus. This is the mudra of Amitābha.
